translation.en: This program was founded on certain ideals.
translation.zh: 这支球队创建于某些特定的理念之上

translation.en: They have been drowned by the noise and distraction of fame.
translation.zh: 但这些理念已经被淹没在各种噪音和令人分心的名利中

translation.en: We got lost, caught up in the hype...
translation.zh: 我们迷失过 被吹捧过…

translation.en: ...the celebrity, the glory...
translation.zh: 还有虚名 荣誉…

translation.en: ...and the relentless pressure to keep the streak alive.
translation.zh: 和源源不断的压力就是为了让这连胜继续下去

translation.en: The sophomore goes back to set up the screen for Tucker.
translation.zh: 二年级生回身为塔克做掩护

translation.en: Tucker got a block. Tucker has space.
translation.zh: 塔克得到队友的掩护塔克获得了空挡

translation.en: -Tucker breaks a tackle. -What a move!
translation.zh: -塔克冲破擒抱-漂亮！

translation.en: Forty-five up the middle. One man to beat.
translation.zh: 45号直接来到中路只有一人防守

translation.en: Throwing one deep down the middle, going for Jones. Touchdown De La Salle!
translation.zh: 他从中路投出一记长传 琼斯接到了德拉萨尔队达阵得分

translation.en: Absolutely unbelievable.
translation.zh: 真是难以置信

translation.en: The greatest high-school performance I've seen in 15 years.
translation.zh: 这是我15年来见过最棒的高中球队

translation.en: De La Salle High has won three titles in a row.
translation.zh: 他们连续三年夺冠

translation.en: Their 48th consecutive victory.
translation.zh: 这也是他们的第48场连胜 （第48场连胜）

translation.en: To the fans, it's quickly becoming known as "The Streak."
translation.zh: “连胜纪录王”很快在球队支持者中间广为称颂

translation.en: Tonight, they break a 22-year-old win record held by a Michigan high school.
translation.zh: 今晚 他们打破了由密歇根高中保持了22年的连胜纪录

translation.en: Talking about streaks, there's a lot of pressure--
translation.zh: 说起连胜球队还需要背负许多压力…

translation.en: Coach Lad has done an amazing job.
translation.zh: 拉德教练把这群孩子指导得极为出色

translation.en: De La Salle has been winning for the past 11 years, straight.
translation.zh: （1999年 100场胜利） 过去11年中 德拉萨尔一直连胜

translation.en: Welcome to the 2003 Northern Conference Sectional Championships...
translation.zh: 欢迎来到2003年北分区冠军赛

translation.en: ...where powerhouse De La Salle brings their 150-game win streak...
translation.zh: 劲旅德拉萨尔对战匹兹堡海盗队

translation.en: ...against their rivals, the Pirates of Pittsburg High.
translation.zh: 若赢下此役他们将取得150场连胜

translation.en: -Hey, Bob. Bob. -Marty, you live under the stadium?
translation.zh: -嘿 鲍伯-马蒂 你住在体育馆里吗？

translation.en: Bob, 25 years coaching this team...
translation.zh: 鲍伯 你执教球队25年

translation.en: ...favored to win your 12th championship, 150 wins. How did you pull it off?
translation.zh: 马上就要取得第12座冠军奖杯和150场连胜 你是怎么做到的？

translation.en: Well, winning a lot of games is doable.
translation.zh: 赢下许多比赛不难做到

translation.en: Teaching kids there's more to life, that's hard.
translation.zh: 教育孩子们生活中有更重要的事情这才是困难的

translation.en: Come on. You turned this team into a winning machine.
translation.zh: 拜托 鲍伯 你把这支球队打造成了赢球机器

translation.en: How long you think you can keep the streak alive?
translation.zh: 你认为连胜纪录能保持多久？

translation.en: The streak was never our goal.
translation.zh: 连胜从来就不是我们的目标

translation.en: Yeah? Well, then, why do you keep winning?
translation.zh: 是吗 那你们为什么一直赢？

translation.en: This program's a lot of things.
translation.zh: 高中球队很复杂

translation.en: It's not just a football team, or win-streak machine.
translation.zh: 不单纯是一支橄榄球队或连胜机器 （球队会议24小时之前）

translation.en: It's a family.
translation.zh: 球队是个大家庭

translation.en: A brotherhood which is based in love.
translation.zh: 是以爱为纽带的兄弟情

translation.en: Put simply...
translation.zh: 简而言之…

translation.en: ...love means you can count on me, in good times and in bad.
translation.zh: 爱意味着 不论顺境逆境你们都能依靠我

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, here to play for their 12th straight championship win...
translation.zh: 各位 下面进场的是为他们的第12座冠军奖杯而战的

translation.en: ...the De La Salle Spartans.
translation.zh: 德拉萨尔斯巴达人队

translation.en: Go Spartans!
translation.zh: 加油 斯巴达人队！

translation.en: I love this part. Totally freaks out the other team.
translation.zh: 我超爱这个环节完全把其他球队镇住了

translation.en: I know I'm not supposed to say this, let alone think it.
translation.zh: 我知道我不该说这些你们也不必多想

translation.en: This streak's our legacy.
translation.zh: 这个连胜纪录是我们的传奇

translation.en: We will never experience anything like this again in our lives.
translation.zh: 从今以后 我们的生命中再也不会有这样的经历了

translation.en: You guys are all my family...
translation.zh: 你们都是我的家人

translation.en: ...but after tomorrow night, this will never be like this again.
translation.zh: 但明晚过后一切都会改变

translation.en: I'll never forget my time on this team, or with you.
translation.zh: 我永远不会忘记跟球队跟你们度过的每分每秒

translation.en: Spartans for life!
translation.zh: 一生都是斯巴达人

translation.en: Spartans for life!
translation.zh: 一生都是斯巴达人

translation.en: Streak, streak, streak!
translation.zh: 连胜！

translation.en: Terrance Kelly takes the opening kickoff on the five-yard line. Gets a block.
translation.zh: 特伦斯凯利在五码线处接住了开球 得到了队友的掩护

translation.en: Terrance Kelly is the best prospect on the field.
translation.zh: 特伦斯凯利是场上最有前途的队员

translation.en: Sees a wedge and shoots up the middle over the 40.
translation.zh: 在40码中路遭遇了楔形防守

translation.en: Brought down on the 49-yard line.
translation.zh: 在49码线那里被放倒在地

translation.en: All right, I got Cam's card.
translation.zh: 好了 我拿到卡姆的卡片了

translation.en: "Training goal: Five extra gassers after practice every day." Done.
translation.zh: 训练目标每天训练结束后再加五组练习 完成

translation.en: "Practice goal: Catch every ball." Perfect.
translation.zh: 练习目标 接住每个球完美

translation.en: "Game goal: 200 yards receiving, two touchdowns...
translation.zh: 比赛目标接球推进200码 两次达阵

translation.en: ...and average 15 yards after every catch."
translation.zh: 每次接到球后再向前推进15码

translation.en: Did you hear that? That is a perfect commitment card.
translation.zh: 大家听到了吗？那是张完美的保证卡

translation.en: Big goals that stretch his abilities, but doable when giving a perfect effort.
translation.zh: 远大的目标能拓展他的能力在尽全力时是完全可以做到的

translation.en: -You go get those, Cam. -Yes, sir.
translation.zh: -拿回去吧 卡姆-遵命

translation.en: Gonzales throws a long, deep ball to Cam Colvin...
translation.zh: 冈萨雷斯向卡姆科尔文掷出一记长球

translation.en: ...who out-jumps the defenders for De La Salle's first score of the game.
translation.zh: 他摆脱了防守队员为德拉萨尔取得了本场比赛的第一分

translation.en: Colvin is a coveted Division 1 prospect...
translation.zh: 科尔文是一区大学联赛的希望之星

translation.en: ...who's drawing interest from top programs in the country.
translation.zh: 国内许多顶尖球队都对他感兴趣

translation.en: Not asking you to be perfect every play. What we're asking of you...
translation.zh: 我们并不是要求你们每一场比赛都打得完美

translation.en: ...and what you should be asking of each other...
translation.zh: 我所要求的以及你们应该互相要求的

translation.en: ...is to give a perfect effort from snap to whistle.
translation.zh: 是从头到尾都要拼尽全力

translation.en: Cam Colvin just pitched the ball back to Kelly.
translation.zh: 卡姆科尔文把球抛给了凯利

translation.en: The most athletic play I've seen all year.
translation.zh: 这是我今年看过最激烈的比赛

translation.en: I got T.K.'s card. "Three extra sets, cleans, every day after practice."
translation.zh: 我拿到了TK的卡片每天训练结束后加练三组

translation.en: Blue 18! Set, hut!
translation.zh: 蓝18战术 预备 开始

translation.en: Throw the ball!
translation.zh: 传球

translation.en: Yeah, that's it!
translation.zh: 干得好

translation.en: -I got Howard's card. -This is Jimmy's card.
translation.zh: -我拿到了霍华德的卡片-这是吉米的

translation.en: -Nice! Great block. -"Two hundred fifty push-ups...
translation.zh: -漂亮的掩护-肌肉训练后加练…

translation.en: -...after workout." -"Get to the second level on sweeps."
translation.zh: -250次俯卧撑-力量测试达到二级

translation.en: I have Chris' card.
translation.zh: 我拿到了克里斯的卡片

translation.en: "Training commitment: Ten extra tire drags after practice every day.
translation.zh: 训练承诺每天加练十个来回的拖轮胎练习

translation.en: Game goal: Two running touchdowns."
translation.zh: 比赛目标 两次冲球达阵

translation.en: Their middle linebacker's gonna be covering you, Chris.
translation.zh: 克里斯 比赛绝大多数时间对方的中线卫会来防守你

translation.en: You have way more speed than him.
translation.zh: 你要想办法比他们更迅速

translation.en: Gonzales, under center, takes the snap.
translation.zh: 冈萨雷斯在本方中锋身后接开球

translation.en: Pitches out to Ryan, who's got room to run.
translation.zh: 传给了有跑动空间的莱恩

translation.en: Sheds a tackle.
translation.zh: 莱恩躲过了擒抱

translation.en: In for the touchdown, which makes the score 27 to nothing.
translation.zh: 触地得分现在的比分为27比0

translation.en: So, Mickey, does Chris wanna break this record as bad as you?
translation.zh: 米基 克里斯和你一样迫切地想破纪录吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, he's getting there. -Thanks. Good block, good block.
translation.zh: -是啊 他进步不小-谢谢 漂亮的掩护

translation.en: You see number 34? Ryan?
translation.zh: 看到34号莱恩了吗？

translation.en: Chris Ryan? Write that name down.
translation.zh: 克里斯莱恩 写下这个名字

translation.en: When Cam Colvin and Terrance Kelly are gone, he's the whole team.
translation.zh: 等卡姆科尔文和特伦斯凯利毕业了他就是球队的主力军

translation.en: I mention he's gonna break the state's scoring record next year?
translation.zh: 我提起过他明年会打破州得分纪录吗？

translation.en: If there's anything anyone wants to say, now is your shot.
translation.zh: 还有人想说什么的话请尽管开口

translation.en: Look, I just wanna say...
translation.zh: 我只想说

translation.en: ...in my four years here I played a lot of games.
translation.zh: 在这里的4年 我打过很多比赛

translation.en: But none is more important to me than tomorrow's. My last game.
translation.zh: 但哪一场都比不上明天这场重要我的最后一场比赛

translation.en: I love you, guys.
translation.zh: 兄弟们 我爱你们

translation.en: We always say to finish strong, right?
translation.zh: 我们总说会有完美结局 对吧？

translation.en: Tomorrow I'm playing for Cam's mom...
translation.zh: 明天 我为卡姆的妈妈而战

translation.en: ...who loves this team almost as much as Cam does.
translation.zh: 她跟卡姆一样深爱着这支球队

translation.en: Love you, boy.
translation.zh: 兄弟 我爱你

translation.en: Love you too, man.
translation.zh: 我也爱你 兄弟

translation.en: I know some of you guys already know this, but most of you don't.
translation.zh: 我知道你们中的有些人已经知道了不过大多数还不知道

translation.en: My grandfather has cancer.
translation.zh: 我爷爷得了癌症

translation.en: He can't come to our practices anymore, he can't even make the games.
translation.zh: 他再也不能来看我们训练了甚至不能去看比赛

translation.en: But every day, he waits for me to get back from practice...
translation.zh: 不过 他每天都等我训练完回家

translation.en: ...just so I can tell him how we're doing.
translation.zh: 听我给他讲今天的训练

translation.en: As simple as that sounds...
translation.zh: 就是这么简单

translation.en: ...that's one of the things that keeps him going.
translation.zh: 这就是他继续活下去的动力

translation.en: You know, our progress keeps him going.
translation.zh: 我们的进步支撑他继续走下去

translation.en: I'm grateful for that.
translation.zh: 我很感激大家

translation.en: None of the juniors share their emotions. Just the seniors.
translation.zh: 没有一个三年级学生分享他们的情感都是四年级的

translation.en: -I know. -Second string, you're in.
translation.zh: -是啊-替补队员 你们上

translation.en: Coach Bob Ladouceur is putting in his juniors.
translation.zh: 鲍伯拉杜尔斯教练换上了三年级的替补队员

translation.en: These young men have big shoes to fill...
translation.zh: 如果这群年轻人想要延续不败纪录

translation.en: ...if they plan on continuing this undefeated streak.
translation.zh: 他们还有很长的路要走

translation.en: Tayshon Lanear missed an easy block...
translation.zh: 泰兴兰尼尔错失了一次轻松的阻挡

translation.en: -...Chris Ryan pays the price. -Let's hit out there!
translation.zh: -却让克里斯莱恩付出了代价-我们继续进攻

translation.en: Yo, Tayshon. If it isn't too much to ask, pick it up.
translation.zh: 喂 泰兴别胡思乱想 注意力集中点

translation.en: -Chill, man. I'll get you on the next play. -Don't get it right, don't get a next one.
translation.zh: 放松 我们有三次达阵在手下一次会掩护好你的 这次做不好 是不会有下次的

translation.en: Hey, easy, little Lad. Your pops is the coach, not you.
translation.zh: 放松点 小拉德你老爸是教练 你可不是

translation.en: Hut!
translation.zh: 开球

translation.en: Go Ryan! Bring it in!
translation.zh: 莱恩加油 快得分

translation.en: -Chris Ryan with another great run. -Attaboy, Chris!
translation.zh: -又是莱恩的精彩达阵-太棒了 克里斯

translation.en: -Huh, 34. -Yeah.
Four, three, two, one!
translation.zh: 四 三 二 一

translation.en: De La Salle! De La Salle! De La Salle!
translation.zh: 德拉萨尔…

translation.en: De La Salle pushes their winning streak to 151 games.
translation.zh: 德拉萨尔把他们的连胜纪录改写成了151场

translation.en: We're number one! We're number one!
translation.zh: 我们是第一！

translation.en: De La Salle's streak continues.
translation.zh: 德拉萨尔的连胜纪录还在继续

translation.en: We're number one! We're number one!
translation.zh: 我们是第一！

translation.en: Streak! Streak! Streak!
translation.zh: 连胜…

translation.en: Great game, coach.
translation.zh: 比赛真棒 教练

translation.en: Half a dozen schools want us to come for official visits.
translation.zh: 六七所学校邀请我们正式拜访

translation.en: -He deserves it, Mr. Kelly. -Thank you, coach. Great job.
translation.zh: -这是应得的 凯利先生-谢谢 教练 太棒了

translation.en: -Hey, T-Gram. -Great job, Coach Ladouceur.
translation.zh: -嗨 小T的奶奶-拉杜尔斯教练 你太棒了

translation.en: Hey, this is crazy.
translation.zh: 看 这太疯狂了

translation.en: There's my baby.
translation.zh: 那是我的宝贝

translation.en: T-Gram! That's cool.
translation.zh: 奶奶 太酷了

translation.en: Get off of me, you big bugger.
translation.zh: 放开我 你这个大块头

translation.en: -Pops. -Great job.
translation.zh: -老爸-干得漂亮

translation.en: -Good stuff. I love you. -Love you too.
translation.zh: -太棒了 我爱你-我也爱你

translation.en: -Hey, coach. -You're doing it.
translation.zh: -嘿 教练-你做到了

translation.en: You're doing it. Getting my baby out of Richmond.
translation.zh: 你做到了 把我的宝贝从里士满带出来

translation.en: -He's a very special young man. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -他是个很特别的年轻人-谢谢

translation.en: T-Gram, I'm gonna come see you every chance I get, right?
translation.zh: 奶奶 我一有空就会回去看你的 好吗？

translation.en: I don't want you back in that Richmond mess.
translation.zh: 我可不想你回到里士满那烂地方

translation.en: We coming to see you.
translation.zh: 我们会去看你的

translation.en: Quitter! Hey.
translation.zh: 半途而废的家伙！嘿

translation.en: Hey, boss.
translation.zh: 嗨 老兄

translation.en: -Morning, coach. Keep the streak alive. -Morning, Pete. The streak alive, yeah.
translation.zh: （加州康科德） -早安 教练 要让纪录延续下去-早安 皮特 没错

translation.en: Michael, cut it out. All right? Seriously.
translation.zh: 迈克尔 别吹了好吗？我认真的

translation.en: You kidding me?
translation.zh: 你在开玩笑吗？

translation.en: -I'll break that. -Guys, guys!
translation.zh: -我要把这东西拆了-孩子们 孩子们

translation.en: Come here! Give me that horn! Come back here, you little--
translation.zh: -过来 给我那只喇叭-过来 你这个小…

translation.en: Here he is. Good run?
translation.zh: 回来了 跑得还开心吗？

translation.en: -Hey, Terry. -Hey, there he is.
translation.zh: -嘿 特里-这家伙来啦

translation.en: Cal State. What do they want?
translation.zh: 加州州立大学寄来的 有什么事情吗？

translation.en: It's just a coaching offer.
translation.zh: 只是一份教练的工作邀请

translation.en: You're throwing it in the trash? A job offer. We don't get to talk about it?
translation.zh: 你把工作邀请扔进垃圾桶里我们都不用先谈一谈吗？

translation.en: College coaching. It's not what I do.
translation.zh: 执教大学 那不是我的工作

translation.en: But we should at least discuss it, Bob.
translation.zh: 但我们至少应该讨论一下吧 鲍伯

translation.en: -Terry. -Hey, great pancakes.
translation.zh: -特里-嘿 煎饼很美味

translation.en: Wow, okay.
translation.zh: 噢 好吧

translation.en: You, Louis Armstrong, in your room. Practice.
translation.zh: 你 爵士音乐家 回房间练习去

translation.en: You, million things to do.
translation.zh: 你有一堆事儿要做呢

translation.en: Gotta take the tree down. I've been up since 5. I'm just like....
translation.zh: 要砍倒那棵树 我5点就起床了我真是…

translation.en: Make sure your room is clean, Michael.
translation.zh: 迈克尔 整理好你的房间

translation.en: You should at least consider it, Bob.
translation.zh: 你至少应该考虑一下的 鲍伯

translation.en: Great pancakes.
translation.zh: 薄饼真好吃

translation.en: He acts like it doesn't mean anything to him...
translation.zh: 表面看来 他对此兴趣不大

translation.en: ...but he's got a diary, just counting down the TDs.
translation.zh: 不过他有本日记专门纪录达阵次数呢

translation.en: -A diary? -She's a chronic liar.
translation.zh: -日记-她太爱编故事了

translation.en: -A very, very ill young woman. -Really?
translation.zh: -好病态的女孩-真的吗？

translation.en: Did I mention delusional?
translation.zh: 我提到过你的妄想症吗？

translation.en: -You have a diary. -It's a playbook. At least my earrings...
translation.zh: -你居然有本日记-那是本战术图集 至少我的耳环

translation.en: -...aren't bigger than my girlfriend's. -Sure. Okay. That's mean, but true.
translation.zh: -还没我女朋友的那么大-好吧 这话挺损的 不过的确如此

translation.en: Yo, my fellow Spartans.
translation.zh: 斯巴达人队的伙伴们

translation.en: I gotta mind my etiquette.
translation.zh: 我得注意一下打招呼的方式

translation.en: You're officially Captain Chris I'm-Gonna- Break-the-State-TD-Scoring-Record now.
translation.zh: 你现在可是正式的克里斯队长了还要打破达阵得分的州纪录

translation.en: Well, at least the vote was based on ability...
translation.zh: 好吧 至少投票是以实力为基础的

translation.en: ...not family connections, little Lad.
translation.zh: 跟亲戚关系无关对吧 小拉德

translation.en: Like how I'm gonna be starting wide receiver and not you?
translation.zh: 比如说我会是首发外接手 而不是你

translation.en: Hey, man. It's cool. We'll see.
translation.zh: 老兄 没关系嘛 我们走着瞧

translation.en: Oh, look out. Here comes the luckiest cornhusker in Contra Costa County.
translation.zh: 那不是康特拉科斯塔县最幸运的乡巴佬吗？

translation.en: -Beasie! -What's up?
translation.zh: -毕瑟尔！-你们好啊

translation.en: -How's it going, fellas? -Hey, girls.
translation.zh: -伙计们 还好吗？-嘿 姑娘们

translation.en: My big man on the line.
translation.zh: 大人物来了

translation.en: -Gotta bring it for me. -To the house.
translation.zh: -快来见我-出场

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay, okay.
translation.zh: -好-好的

translation.en: -I'm gonna go freshen up. Wanna come? -Yes.
translation.zh: -我要去洗手间补妆 你们一起来吗？-好啊

translation.en: -How much fresher can she get? -Too fresh for you.
translation.zh: -她还能打扮成啥样？-漂亮到你配不上

translation.en: Sassy.
translation.zh: 厚脸皮啊

translation.en: Why do they do that? Go together.
translation.zh: 她们怎么干什么都一起

translation.en: -How did you get with her? -She asked me out.
translation.zh: -你怎么跟她勾搭上的？-她约我出去

translation.en: -She asked him out. -Tell me you're jumping all over that.
translation.zh: 她约他出去告诉我你已经跟她…

translation.en: No, we're-- We're waiting.
translation.zh: 不 我们还在等

translation.en: -They're waiting. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -他们还在等-对

translation.en: -For what? -The big day.
translation.zh: -等什么？-大日子

translation.en: We took a purity pledge.
translation.zh: 我们许下了贞洁承诺

translation.en: Son. What's the name of the cult that you're in?
translation.zh: 伙计 你入了什么教来着？

translation.en: Pleasant Hill Baptist.
translation.zh: 愉悦山浸信会

translation.en: That boy's taken one too many shots to the head.
translation.zh: 那家伙被球砸傻了吧

translation.en: Sounds like all the other college offers.
translation.zh: 又是大学的工作邀请

translation.en: -A nice house? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -给你一座好房子-是

translation.en: The kids going to college for free? What was I thinking?
translation.zh: 孩子们可以免费上大学 我在想什么？

translation.en: Look, the players are handpicked, self-motivated, smart...
translation.zh: 你看 这些运动员是经过精挑细选的他们聪明而上进

translation.en: ...eyes fixed on their bright futures. They don't need what I do, Bev.
translation.zh: 着眼于他们光明的未来他们不需要我的指导 毕芙

translation.en: They don't need a coach who knows the game inside and out?
translation.zh: 他们不需要一位全方位了解比赛的教练吗？

translation.en: Who knows how to teach kids to become honorable, accountable men...
translation.zh: 不需要以教导孩子为荣誉感责任感…

translation.en: ...with self-worth?
translation.zh: 和自我价值的优秀教练吗？

translation.en: Bob, you do it and I've watched you do it brilliantly since I was 23 years old.
translation.zh: 鲍伯 你做到了 我从23岁起就看着你在做这些 而且做得很精彩

translation.en: I wouldn't be helping anyone.
translation.zh: 我在那里并没有用武之地

translation.en: I mean, shouldn't it be easier? Don't you deserve that?
translation.zh: 那换个轻松点的工作不好吗？这不是你应得的吗？

translation.en: I've seen the schedule for college coaches.
translation.zh: 我看过大学教练的工作安排了

translation.en: You think it'd be easier, less grueling? It would not.
translation.zh: 你以为会轻松吗？并没有

translation.en: You don't know. How do you know?
translation.zh: 你不知道 你怎么知道？

translation.en: I just want you happy and healthy...
translation.zh: 我只希望你能健康快乐

translation.en: ...and yeah, home every once in a while, just playing football with your own kids.
translation.zh: 偶尔能回家跟自己的孩子打打球

translation.en: Going for a stupid walk for hot chocolate...
translation.zh: 傻乎乎地出去买杯热巧克力

translation.en: ...maybe more than, you know, twice a decade.
translation.zh: 也许十年超过两次

translation.en: You-- You're gonna get your record, bro.
translation.zh: 你就要拥有自己的纪录了 兄弟

translation.en: Even if Mickey has to steal it.
translation.zh: 就算米基会偷走的

translation.en: Forget about your dad.
translation.zh: 忘掉你父亲吧

translation.en: You're 37 touchdowns away from breaking a state record.
translation.zh: 你距离打破州纪录只剩37次达阵

translation.en: All right, it's about you.
translation.zh: 好吧 这是你的事情

translation.en: Us.
translation.zh: 我们的

translation.en: -Our year. -Our year.
translation.zh: -属于我们的一年-我们的一年

translation.en: -Hold them high, boys. Hold them high. -T.K.
translation.zh: -举高点 伙计们 举高点-TK

translation.en: -What's up, big guy? -To your year. Chris, you--
translation.zh: -你好啊 大块头-敬你们的一年 克里斯

translation.en: You're captain now. My man Danny over here, he grew up on the team.
translation.zh: 你是队长了我兄弟丹尼也在 他跟球队一起成长

translation.en: Has all the credit, he doesn't need a title.
translation.zh: 他拥有全部荣誉 不需要一个头衔了

translation.en: Kind of makes me wonder.
translation.zh: 不禁让我会想

translation.en: About what?
translation.zh: 想什么？

translation.en: If it's gonna be your year, or some other team's year.
translation.zh: 这会是属于你们的还是属于其他球队的一年

translation.en: -K, we haven't lost a game-- -I know, believe me.
translation.zh: -K 我们还没输过比赛呢-我知道 相信我

translation.en: I'm just saying, you guys gotta open your eyes. You ain't ready.
translation.zh: 我只想说 你们要睁大眼睛你们还没准备好呢

translation.en: On skills, you have half the team we did.
translation.zh: 论技术 你们比我们还差得远

translation.en: On attitude, most of y'all got big heads or just wanna wear the jersey.
translation.zh: 论态度 多数人都有点自我膨胀只是想穿上这身球衣

translation.en: So you gotta step up. You gotta become real leaders.
translation.zh: 所以你要努力提高成为真正的领导者

translation.en: You have to motivate your players to get their game even tighter than ours.
translation.zh: 你们要激励队员们让他们比我们取得更棒的成绩

translation.en: Next year is on you.
translation.zh: 下一年就靠你们了

translation.en: Take care, boys.
translation.zh: 伙计们保重

translation.en: -Peace, man. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你也保重-好的

translation.en: It's time to deal with the De La Salle problem.
translation.zh: 下面该解决一下德拉萨尔的问题了 （北岸区公平竞争特别听证会）

translation.en: Last year, De La Salle out-scored league opponents...
translation.zh: 去年 德拉萨尔得分远远超过对手

translation.en: Their average score against league teams was 47 to 4.
translation.zh: 他们与其他队伍的平均比分为47比4

translation.en: How, Bob? How are we supposed to compete against a program...
translation.zh: 鲍伯 我们怎么可能竞争过

translation.en: ...that pulls in the best players with the wave of a scholarship?
translation.zh: 一支用丰厚奖学金吸引最优秀运动员的球队？

translation.en: For the hundredth time...
translation.zh: 我说过无数遍了

translation.en: ...De La Salle High's code of conduct forbids scholarshipping athletes.
translation.zh: 德拉萨尔高中的校规是不收奖学金运动员的

translation.en: Explain to me why the best wide receiver in my district...
translation.zh: 那你解释一下为什么我们区域最优秀的外接手

translation.en: ...rides a bus for a solid hour up to De La Salle.
translation.zh: 要坐一小时的公交车去德拉萨尔上学

translation.en: Our program attracts great athletes, plain and simple.
translation.zh: 我们的球队吸引顶尖运动员就是这么简单

translation.en: No matter how you get your players, you're stacking your team with talent.
translation.zh: 不管你们的队员是怎么来的你们的队伍就是建立在天才球员之上

translation.en: -That's not cheating? -Let me get this straight.
translation.zh: -这不算作弊吗？-我们把话说清楚

translation.en: You wanna penalize us for building a winning program?
translation.zh: 你在指责我们建起了一支赢球的队伍

translation.en: I'm done with this! Nobody wins 151 football games straight without cheating.
translation.zh: 我受够了！不作弊就连胜151场 这怎么可能

translation.en: We will not play De La Salle next season.
translation.zh: 明年我们不再和德拉萨尔比赛了

translation.en: Great. Done. We don't wanna play you either.
translation.zh: 很好 我们也不想跟你们比赛

translation.en: We'll play our five league games...
translation.zh: 我们先打第五级联赛的比赛

translation.en: ...then we'll fill our open slots with tougher teams from bigger conferences.
translation.zh: 然后补强弱项跟来自更高级别的更强队伍比赛

translation.en: Gee, seems like I heard the 49ers already have a full schedule.
translation.zh: 我听说49人队的赛程都满了

translation.en: Who's left?
translation.zh: 还剩哪家？

translation.en: Long Beach Poly.
translation.zh: 长滩保利队

translation.en: Eidson, Poly's the number-one high-school team in Southern California.
translation.zh: 爱迪生 保利队可是南加州排名第一的球队

translation.en: Yeah. Isn't it great?
translation.zh: 当然 这不好吗？

translation.en: Poly?
translation.zh: 保利？

translation.en: -We talked about this. -Never said you set it up.
translation.zh: -我们谈过-你可没说已经定下来了

translation.en: Nationally, we're number one. They're number two.
translation.zh: 全国来看我们是第一 他们是第二

translation.en: They've been trying to get us on their schedule.
translation.zh: 五年来 他们一直想跟我们比赛

translation.en: They're not afraid of us.
translation.zh: 他们不怕我们

translation.en: Guys, can't wait to see you play Poly.
translation.zh: 伙计们 等不及看你们跟保利的比赛了

translation.en: Good luck.
translation.zh: 祝你们好运

translation.en: You can thank me later.
translation.zh: 等会儿再谢我

translation.en: In Luke 6:38...
translation.zh: 在《路加福音》第六章第38节中 （德拉萨尔高中）

translation.en: ...Luke says, "Give and it will be given to you.
translation.zh: 路加说：“你们要给人就必有给你们的 （151场 连胜万岁！）

translation.en: Good measure, pressed down, shaken together and running over...
translation.zh: 并且用十足的升斗连摇带按 上尖下流地

translation.en: ...will be poured into your lap...
translation.zh: 倒在你们怀里

translation.en: ...for with the measure you use, it will be measured to you."
translation.zh: 因为你们用什么量器量给人也必用什么量器量给你们”

translation.en: Any idea what Luke is saying here? Arturo?
translation.zh: 谁知道路加这段话是什么意思？阿图罗？

translation.en: You reap what you sow.
translation.zh: 一分耕耘 一分收获

translation.en: Like, whatever you do, good or bad, comes back to you.
translation.zh: 你做过的好事和坏事都会反映在自己身上

translation.en: Anyone else think you give to others...
translation.zh: 还有没有人觉得如果你给予别人

translation.en: ...and the blessing is returned in equal measure?
translation.zh: 自己也会因此蒙福？

translation.en: Salinas.
translation.zh: 萨利纳斯

translation.en: I've worked hard to do the right thing, and I've been blessed.
translation.zh: 我努力做正确的事所以我一直很幸运

translation.en: -How's that? -Getting to play on the streak team.
translation.zh: -此话怎讲？-能够在连胜球队中打球

translation.en: You ain't in line to be starting quarterback on the streak team...
translation.zh: 你的确很努力 不过你能在连胜球队中充当首发四分卫

translation.en: ...because you've done the right thing.
translation.zh: 并不是因为你做了正确的事

translation.en: It's because you're 6'2" with a cannon for an arm.
translation.zh: 是因为你身高一米八八胳膊像大炮一样粗

translation.en: So, Tayshon, what do you believe?
translation.zh: 泰兴 你怎么看？

translation.en: Well, down where I sleep, the dealers in Richmond make mad money.
translation.zh: 好吧 那就说说我家乡里士满的商人赚黑心钱

translation.en: My aunt was an ER nurse. Worked her whole life helping people.
translation.zh: 我姨妈是急诊室护士一生都在帮助别人

translation.en: Time came for her to get hers, they up and fired her...
translation.zh: 到了她该颐养天年的时候他们却解雇了她

translation.en: ...six months before they gotta pay her retirement.
translation.zh: 就在她能领到退休金的六个月前

translation.en: Dog-eat-dog. Take what you need. They don't care how good you've been.
translation.zh: 人吃人的世界 他们会夺走你的一切并不在意你是个多好的人

translation.en: You sitting around waiting for somebody to pay you back, you going hungry.
translation.zh: 你坐在这里 等着什么人来回报你你会饿死的

translation.en: So why does a guy like Luke, who's a doctor, painter, writer, historian...
translation.zh: 那么 像路加这样一位医生 画家 作家 历史学家

translation.en: ...take the time to invent a lie?
translation.zh: 要花功夫来制造谎言呢？

translation.en: It ain't a lie.
translation.zh: 那不是谎言

translation.en: Your pops dies, five-0 puts your mom on trial for it when, oops...
translation.zh: 你爸爸死了警察却抓你妈妈受审

translation.en: ...our bad, the shipyard poisoned him.
translation.zh: 不好意思 其实是船坞主毒死了他

translation.en: Pressure gives her a stroke and now she ain't got long.
translation.zh: 然后她在重压之下中风现在撑不了多久了

translation.en: Easy. Everyone knows the story.
translation.zh: 别说了 人人都知道这故事

translation.en: So tell me, homey.
translation.zh: 所以告诉我 老兄

translation.en: You really been that bad to deserve all that's come your way?
translation.zh: 你真有那么坏要让你来承受这一切不幸吗？

translation.en: Can I speak to Cam?
translation.zh: 可以找卡姆谈谈吗？

translation.en: Cam.
translation.zh: 卡姆

translation.en: Yo, Coach Lad.
translation.zh: 嗨 拉德教练

translation.en: Yo, Jamal.
translation.zh: 嗨 贾马尔

translation.en: Cool, thanks.
translation.zh: 好棒 谢谢

translation.en: Coach. You know how you like to talk and talk...
translation.zh: 教练 你知道吗？你总爱不停地说

translation.en: -...and sometimes holler? -That's right.
translation.zh: -有的时候还喊？-没错

translation.en: And one time, Cam said you said the S-word.
translation.zh: 有一次 卡姆说你爆了粗口

translation.en: I remember that time.
translation.zh: 我记得那一次

translation.en: Well, here, you gotta be real quiet. My mom's resting.
translation.zh: 好了 你一定要非常安静妈妈在休息

translation.en: Not a peep.
translation.zh: 不准偷看

translation.en: -Hey, coach. -Cam, look.
translation.zh: -嘿 教练-卡姆 快看

translation.en: Man, that is tight.
translation.zh: 噢 小子 真棒

translation.en: Watch Mama, all right?
translation.zh: 照顾好妈妈 好吗？

translation.en: See, Mama?
translation.zh: 快看 妈妈

translation.en: How is she?
translation.zh: 她怎么样了

translation.en: The nurse say...
translation.zh: 护士说…

translation.en: ...it's just a matter of time.
translation.zh: 只是时间问题了

translation.en: And that's it. That's the last of my Mohicans.
translation.zh: 就这样了 这是她最后的时间

translation.en: You have Jamal.
translation.zh: 你还有贾马尔

translation.en: The boy don't know it yet...
translation.zh: 他还什么都不懂

translation.en: ...but he's going down to San Jose, stay with my cousin.
translation.zh: 他要去圣何塞跟我堂兄一起生活了

translation.en: They should be good to him, but ain't got no room for me.
translation.zh: 他们会好好照顾他不过那里的空间不够我去住

translation.en: I got nobody left.
translation.zh: 我没有家人可以依靠了

translation.en: Well, family isn't just blood relatives.
translation.zh: 家庭并不局限于血缘关系

translation.en: It's anyone who loves you unconditionally.
translation.zh: 任何无条件爱你的都是你的家人

translation.en: "To Coach Lad...
translation.zh: “致拉德教练…

translation.en: ...I promise to live the rest of my days by the lessons you taught me.
translation.zh: 我承诺 从今往后都要遵循着你教给我的道理生活

translation.en: 'Give and it shall be given to you...
translation.zh: ‘你们要给人 就必有给你们的…

translation.en: ...for whatever measure you use, it shall be measured back to you in equal--'"
translation.zh: 你们用什么量器量给别人也必用什么量器量给你们’”

translation.en: Why is this happening to me, coach?
translation.zh: 教练 这件事为什么会发生在我身上？

translation.en: What did I do?
translation.zh: 我做错了什么？

translation.en: I'm trying.
translation.zh: 我很努力

translation.en: I'm making my perfect effort.
translation.zh: 我拼尽全力

translation.en: It don't matter. Ain't enough.
translation.zh: 可是没有用 根本不够

translation.en: What if Tayshon is right?
translation.zh: 万一泰兴说的是对的呢？

translation.en: Maybe God don't see me, or he don't care...
translation.zh: 也许上帝看不见我 或者根本不在意我

translation.en: ...because I ain't worth his time.
translation.zh: 因为我不值得他浪费时间

translation.en: Don't make no sense, coach.
translation.zh: 这说不通啊 教练

translation.en: I'm alone.
translation.zh: 我很孤独

translation.en: I got nobody left.
translation.zh: 我无依无靠

translation.en: No, you're not.
translation.zh: 不是这样的

translation.en: You've got Jamal...
translation.zh: 你有贾马尔

translation.en: ...me and 60 brothers.
translation.zh: 有我 还有60个兄弟

translation.en: I'm just gonna nap for 10 more minutes, then get up.
translation.zh: 我小睡10分钟就起来

translation.en: Don't snore.
translation.zh: 别打呼噜

translation.en: I'm not laughing.
translation.zh: 我没开玩笑

translation.en: What did I ever see in you? Bob?
translation.zh: 你在搞什么鬼？鲍伯？

translation.en: Bob? Bob?
translation.zh: 鲍伯

translation.en: Bob, Bob, please. Bob? Bob?
translation.zh: 鲍伯 你怎么了？鲍伯？

translation.en: Danny!
translation.zh: 丹尼！

translation.en: Bob, what's going on? Bob? Oh, my God, Bob!
translation.zh: 鲍伯 你怎么了？鲍伯 天啊 鲍伯

translation.en: -Danny! -Yeah, Mom.
translation.zh: -丹尼！-妈 我在

translation.en: Danny!
translation.zh: 丹尼！

translation.en: -Mom, what's wrong? -Danny, please call 911!
translation.zh: -妈妈 怎么了？-丹尼 快打911

translation.en: -Oh, my God! Call 911! -Mom! Mom!
translation.zh: -天呐 快打911-妈

translation.en: -Dad? Where is the phone? It's not here. -Danny, tell them it's a seizure.
translation.zh: -爸 电话在哪里？不在这儿-丹尼 告诉他们是癫痫

translation.en: -Find the phone! -Where is it?
translation.zh: -去找电话！-在哪里？

translation.en: Oh, my God. Look at me. Look in my eyes. Look in my eyes.
translation.zh: 老天啊 看着我看着我的眼睛

translation.en: Oh, my God, you okay? You okay? Breathe.
translation.zh: 老天 你还好吗？快呼吸

translation.en: -Hey, Amani. Thanks for coming. -Hey, Amani.
translation.zh: -嘿 阿曼尼 谢谢你过来一趟-嘿 阿曼尼

translation.en: -Oh, one for me. Just-- Just one second. -Cool.
translation.zh: -还有我的 就一下-好

translation.en: Hey. Who's in there?
translation.zh: 嘿 他是谁？

translation.en: Currently paying his respects to the coach, Maurice Jones Drew.
translation.zh: 刚才进去探望教练的那位吗？莫里斯琼斯德鲁

translation.en: No way.
translation.zh: 不会吧

translation.en: Coach, make sure I get you tickets to come see me, all right?
translation.zh: 教练 给你球票来看我的比赛 好吗？

translation.en: I want 100 from you.
translation.zh: 我要100张

translation.en: I still can't believe it.
translation.zh: 我还是不相信

translation.en: Coach Lad smoking.
translation.zh: 拉德教练居然抽烟

translation.en: -Mrs. Lad. Good seeing you. -So great to see you.
translation.zh: -拉德太太 很高兴见到你-我也是

translation.en: -Take care of the big guy for me. -Okay, I will. Thanks for coming, Maurice.
translation.zh: -替我照顾好大块头-我会的 谢谢你赶来 莫里斯

translation.en: -Hey, you. -Hey, Dad.
translation.zh: -嘿 你来了-嘿 爸爸

translation.en: Don't look so tough now, huh?
translation.zh: 现在看起来没那么强悍了吧？

translation.en: Mr. Ladouceur.
translation.zh: 拉杜尔斯先生

translation.en: Eighty-three percent occlusion in your PLA descending artery.
translation.zh: 你的后外侧降支动脉有百分之八十三的部分阻塞

translation.en: We call that the widow-maker.
translation.zh: 你老婆差点就成寡妇了

translation.en: -You're a very lucky man. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -不过你很幸运-是啊

translation.en: -So, what happens next? -Recuperation.
translation.zh: -接下来怎么办？-慢慢康复

translation.en: Near-term, I'll be happy if you're in good condition by April.
translation.zh: 近期来看 四月之前能康复就很乐观了

translation.en: That's spring practice.
translation.zh: 那是春季集训

translation.en: Not for you.
translation.zh: 你不行

translation.en: You've got five stents and one shot to heal.
translation.zh: 你心脏里植入了五个支架

translation.en: Stepping onto a field before summer?
translation.zh: 夏天以前就回归训练场？

translation.en: Don't even think about it.
translation.zh: 想都别想

translation.en: Dad, you're gonna coach me next season, right?
translation.zh: 爸爸 下个赛季你会执教我的 对吧？

translation.en: Danny.
translation.zh: 丹尼

translation.en: Danny.
translation.zh: 丹尼

translation.en: Hey, Michael...
translation.zh: 嘿 迈克尔

translation.en: ...wanna go harass some more doctors?
translation.zh: 去找个医生聊一聊吧

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 我们走吧

translation.en: Danny's just worried about you. This really scared him.
translation.zh: 丹尼只是担心你 这次你吓坏他了

translation.en: It's a lie.
translation.zh: 我撒谎了

translation.en: What is?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Me. I got caught up in work and the streak and let it nearly kill me.
translation.zh: 我深陷在工作陷在连胜纪录中 还差点丢了性命

translation.en: I talk character, honesty, perfection...
translation.zh: 我教育他们品格 诚信 至善

translation.en: ...commit to each other, your teachers, your friends, your family.
translation.zh: 为彼此 为老师为朋友和家庭奉献

translation.en: Was I committed to you?
translation.zh: 可我又为你奉献了什么？

translation.en: Was I committed to my children?
translation.zh: 又为孩子们奉献了什么？

translation.en: I've been a lousy husband and the worst dad.
translation.zh: 我是个不合格的丈夫和差到极点的父亲

translation.en: Danny's not angry because he isn't getting the chance to play for you.
translation.zh: 丹尼生气并不是因为失去了在你手下打球的机会

translation.en: He's angry because he wants a chance to know you.
translation.zh: 因为他太想得到一个了解你的机会

translation.en: What do I do now?
translation.zh: 我该怎么做？

translation.en: Spend as much time with your family as you do the team.
translation.zh: 尽可能多的跟家人共度时光就像你跟球队那样

translation.en: See you later, babe. Call me tonight.
translation.zh: 回头见 今晚给我打电话

translation.en: Hey, T.K. Heads up.
translation.zh: 嘿 TK 注意

translation.en: -Over here. -Who wants it?
translation.zh: -这里-谁接球？

translation.en: -Me. -All right.
translation.zh: -我-好的

translation.en: -Me, me, me. -Right here. Right here.
translation.zh: -我-这里

translation.en: -What's all this? -All for you.
translation.zh: -这些都是什么？-都是给你的

translation.en: This is Coach Little. The rules say you can't keep any of it yet.
translation.zh: TK 我是利特尔教练规定说你现在还不能留下这东西

translation.en: You're getting looks from other schools.
translation.zh: 你一定已经参观过别的学校了

translation.en: Peek at what you look like in our gear.
translation.zh: 至少看一看我们对你有多重视

translation.en: If I'd have had these, I'd have been All City.
translation.zh: 我要是有这些 我肯定到处炫耀去了

translation.en: Newest model from Nike.
translation.zh: 最新款耐克

translation.en: Mrs. Kelly, maybe you wanna open that last bubble package.
translation.zh: 凯利夫人 你一定想打开最后的那个气泡密封袋

translation.en: Hey, what you got, T-Gram?
translation.zh: 奶奶 这是什么？

translation.en: Diploma.
translation.zh: 毕业证书

translation.en: -With your name on it. -What?
translation.zh: -上面有你的名字-什么？

translation.en: What? What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: No matter what, four years from now, when you have your real diploma...
translation.zh: 特伦斯 不管将来你会怎样发展四年后当你得到真正的毕业证书

translation.en: ...it will reward you and your family for the rest of your life.
translation.zh: 会让你和你的家庭受益一辈子

translation.en: -Yeah, sure. -So you've got a lot of offers.
translation.zh: -是的 对-你已经收到了一大堆录取通知书

translation.en: What's it gonna take to get you to play for Oregon next year?
translation.zh: （俄勒冈大学） 怎样才能让你明年为俄勒冈队效力呢？

translation.en: Say yes.
translation.zh: 答应吧

translation.en: -Yes. -Cam Colvin comes with me.
translation.zh: -答应啊-我要卡姆科尔文跟我一起去

translation.en: We offered a full ride.
translation.zh: 我们为他提供了全额奖学金

translation.en: We know his mother passed away, but haven't heard back.
translation.zh: 我们知道他妈妈过世了不过还没有收到回应

translation.en: Done deal. Full ride.
translation.zh: 搞定了 全额奖学金

translation.en: Oh, we did it, man.
translation.zh: 我们做到了 孩子

translation.en: Yo, the great black hope.
translation.zh: 你好啊 伟大的黑色希望之星

translation.en: -Cam here? -He's in the back.
translation.zh: -卡姆在吗？-他在最里面那间

translation.en: Y'all come on and get something to eat now.
translation.zh: 你们都过来吃点东西

translation.en: -Oh, coz, what’s up? -What's up?
translation.zh: -噢 怎么了？-怎么了？

translation.en: You get a full ride from Oregon and dodge my calls. That's what's up.
translation.zh: 你获得了俄勒冈的全额奖学金一个星期不接我电话 就是这么回事

translation.en: Look, man, I ain't going to Oregon or any place near you.
translation.zh: 听着 我不会去俄勒冈或者任何离你近的地方

translation.en: I'm going to Miami.
translation.zh: 我要去迈阿密

translation.en: Miami?
translation.zh: 迈阿密？

translation.en: -It's best for me. -Best for you?
translation.zh: -这样对我最好-对你最好？

translation.en: Since day one, we've been doing what's best for us.
translation.zh: 卡姆 从一开始 我们就一直做着各种对我们最好的选择

translation.en: You and me, together.
translation.zh: 你和我要一起离开这里

translation.en: -We were 14. -We were friends.
translation.zh: -当时我们才14岁-我们是朋友

translation.en: Whatever.
translation.zh: 随便了

translation.en: Man, get up! I'm talking to you, dog!
translation.zh: 伙计 起床 我跟你说话呢 老兄

translation.en: Get off me! As smart as you are, you don't know what you don't know!
translation.zh: 放开我！你懂个屁啊

translation.en: You still got Landrin, T-Gram, you got everybody.
translation.zh: 你还有兰德林和奶奶 你拥有一切

translation.en: All I got left is Jamal.
translation.zh: 但我只有贾马尔了

translation.en: I gotta make it to the league so I can take care of him.
translation.zh: 我要努力打上职业联赛才能好好照顾他

translation.en: -Cam, I know how hard this has been-- -Don't!
translation.zh: -卡姆 我知道你有多艰难…-别这样

translation.en: You're just making it harder. Don't you see?
translation.zh: 你没发现你的到来让我更艰难了吗？

translation.en: You see me?
translation.zh: 看到了吗？

translation.en: I'm cursed.
translation.zh: 我被诅咒了

translation.en: Everyone I love--
translation.zh: 我爱的每个人…

translation.en: I can't lose nobody else, man.
translation.zh: 我不能再失去任何人了 老兄

translation.en: T, I gotta let you go, man.
translation.zh: T 我得放你走

translation.en: Man, you done lost a lot of folks, Cam...
translation.zh: 卡姆 你的确失去了一些家人

translation.en: ...but you didn't lose everybody.
translation.zh: 但你并没有失去所有人

translation.en: -Man, why'd you bring me this? -It's proof.
translation.zh: -为什么给我看这个？-这是证明

translation.en: We dreamed about playing college ball since we was kids.
translation.zh: 我们还是孩子的时候就梦想能为大学打球

translation.en: We prayed for it.
translation.zh: 我们为此祈祷

translation.en: And now here we are, damn near grown.
translation.zh: 现在 这个梦想就在眼前

translation.en: Cam, what you're holding, that just ain't a jersey, man.
translation.zh: 卡姆 你手里的不只是一件球衣

translation.en: It's an answered prayer.
translation.zh: 这是祈祷的答复

translation.en: Look at me, dog.
translation.zh: 看着我 兄弟

translation.en: You and me.
translation.zh: 我和你

translation.en: Brothers for life, dog.
translation.zh: 永远是兄弟

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: Brothers for life.
translation.zh: 永远是兄弟

translation.en: All right, team, bring it in. Everyone settle down.
translation.zh: 大家暂停一下 大家歇一会儿

translation.en: Coach Lad is on his way in to say a few words. Bring it down.
translation.zh: 拉德教练要跟我们说几句话大家先暂停

translation.en: Alumbaugh's pulling the team together.
translation.zh: 阿鲁巴正在把大家召集起来

translation.en: Okay. Good.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: I talked to my doctors...
translation.zh: 我跟医生谈过了

translation.en: ...and they don't feel that I should come back to coaching you.
translation.zh: 他们认为我还不能回来继续执教

translation.en: But rather than drawing this whole thing out...
translation.zh: 我不想跟大家模棱两可

translation.en: ...I'm just gonna be truthful with you.
translation.zh: 坦诚地说

translation.en: I'm not sure when I'll be able to return.
translation.zh: 我也不确定自己确切的回归日期

translation.en: I expect you seniors to step up and lead this team.
translation.zh: 我希望新晋的四年级生能够带领好这支队伍

translation.en: And I expect you guys to continue to give a perfect effort...
translation.zh: 我希望你们在每场比赛中继续

translation.en: ...every game.
translation.zh: 拼尽全力

translation.en: Not your typical trumpet number, huh?
translation.zh: 不像你平时的风格啊

translation.en: No, not typical.
translation.zh: 是不寻常

translation.en: Getting the hang of it?
translation.zh: 渐渐上手了吧

translation.en: -Me or Michael? -You.
translation.zh: -我还是迈克尔？-你

translation.en: Anything else I can help you with?
translation.zh: 我还能帮你做别的事吗？

translation.en: No. Think you're doing great.
translation.zh: 不用了 你做得很棒

translation.en: Just remember, I like mine rare.
translation.zh: 不过记住 我喜欢吃生一点的

translation.en: You got it.
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: -You want the other half of this? -Yeah, sure.
translation.zh: -你想喝另一半吗？-好的

translation.en: I've dropped more passes this summer than the previous three years combined.
translation.zh: 这个夏天 我丢掉的传球比过去三年的总和都要多

translation.en: You're not seeing the ball into your hands.
translation.zh: 儿子 你没有注视着即将飞到你手上的球

translation.en: -You're looking up-field before you catch. -I know.
translation.zh: -接球前你却往上看-我知道

translation.en: I try to stop, but--
translation.zh: 我努力克服 可是…

translation.en: What should I do?
translation.zh: 我该怎么做？

translation.en: You gotta work on that with Coach Alumbaugh.
translation.zh: 你该跟阿鲁巴教练讨论一下

translation.en: I don't need Coach Alumbaugh.
translation.zh: 我不需要阿鲁巴教练

translation.en: I need you.
translation.zh: 我需要你

translation.en: My senior season is here, Dad. My last shot.
translation.zh: 爸爸 这是我最后一个赛季最后的机会

translation.en: Danny, I'm not your coach.
translation.zh: 丹尼 我不是你的教练

translation.en: But I wanna spend some time together, get closer.
translation.zh: 但我想跟你共度时光 增进了解

translation.en: -I found a river-rafting outfit-- -River rafting?
translation.zh: -我说过我找到了一套漂流装备吗…-漂流？真棒啊

translation.en: Afterwards, we'll win the father-son three-legged race.
translation.zh: -我说过我找到了一套漂流装备吗…-漂流？真棒啊 然后我们会赢得父子两人三腿竞赛

translation.en: This is perfect. The whole time I needed a father, I got a coach.
translation.zh: 太好了 我一直需要父亲你却总像教练一样

translation.en: And now I need a coach and all I've got is a lame dad.
translation.zh: 现在我需要教练却只得到一个差劲的父亲

translation.en: Exercise?
translation.zh: 开始运动了？

translation.en: Running again.
translation.zh: 重新开始跑步了

translation.en: -How are my test scores? -Better than expected.
translation.zh: -检查结果怎么样？-比预期要好

translation.en: Your heart has made an unusually strong recovery, Mr. Ladouceur.
translation.zh: 拉杜尔斯先生 你的心脏恢复得异乎寻常的好

translation.en: You're free to return to normal activities.
translation.zh: 你可以回归日常生活工作了

translation.en: Coaching?
translation.zh: 当教练呢？

translation.en: Keep the stress down, but, yes.
translation.zh: 压力别太大 不过…可以了

translation.en: Wow, that's great. It must be such a relief.
translation.zh: 哇 太好了 真是松了一口气

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: She said I could go back to coaching.
translation.zh: 她说我能回去执教了

translation.en: So is that your plan, Bob?
translation.zh: 所以这是你的计划吗 鲍伯？

translation.en: We'll see.
translation.zh: 先看看再说

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: What's that?
translation.zh: 这是什么？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Smells good.
translation.zh: 闻起来真香

translation.en: Me or the sauce?
translation.zh: 我还是酱汁？

translation.en: The sauce.
translation.zh: 酱汁

translation.en: I was hoping it was me.
translation.zh: 我还希望是我呢

translation.en: Ready, and go.
translation.zh: 预备 开始

translation.en: Hey, butt kicks.
translation.zh: 嘿 不错

translation.en: Ready, up.
translation.zh: 预备 上

translation.en: You're late.
translation.zh: 你迟到了

translation.en: Yeah, I been busy.
translation.zh: 嗯 我很忙

translation.en: Well, that explains yesterday. You missed an entire practice.
translation.zh: 这跟昨天的借口一模一样你错过了整场训练

translation.en: I got a note from the nurse, little Lad.
translation.zh: 小拉德 我可是有护士的假条

translation.en: How insensitive of us, Chris. He had a tummy ache.
translation.zh: 我们真迟钝啊克里斯 他肚子疼呢

translation.en: And you call me that again, I'll drop you.
translation.zh: 再叫我小拉德 我就扁你

translation.en: Now, that's funny.
translation.zh: 真有意思

translation.en: Nobody misses practice without clearing it with the captain.
translation.zh: 不跟队长打招呼没人可以缺席训练

translation.en: Well, I ain't nobody. On JV, man, I played both ways.
translation.zh: 我可不是“没人”在青年队 我攻防两端都能打

translation.en: Caught 38 passes and five picks. How much practice do I need?
translation.zh: 每场完成38次传球 五次接球我还需要多少训练？

translation.en: It's not about "I." It's about us. This team.
translation.zh: 这不只是“我”的事情是我们这支队伍

translation.en: Both of y'all can go ahead and kiss my--
translation.zh: 去你们的吧

translation.en: Push me? Team?
translation.zh: 敢推我？队伍？

translation.en: Ain't no team. Truth is, it comes down to four or five of us bringing our game.
translation.zh: 根本没什么队伍 事实就是球队中的四五个人就能决定比赛

translation.en: Say what you want, Chris, Danny. This team thing don't mean nothing now.
translation.zh: 随你怎么说 克里斯 丹尼所谓的队伍 现在根本一文不值

translation.en: -Back off! -Hey, hold up!
translation.zh: -让开-住手

translation.en: "Team" means everything right now.
translation.zh: “队伍”意味着一切

translation.en: Look around. To be successful, you'll have to scrap for everything.
translation.zh: 看看吧 想成功就必须争取一切

translation.en: Wanna be a scrappy team? You're gonna have to respect each other.
translation.zh: 想留在一支好斗的队伍里吗？你们必须要尊重彼此

translation.en: Now, get back to practice.
translation.zh: 继续训练吧

translation.en: High kicks.
translation.zh: 高抬腿

translation.en: That's how you do it.
translation.zh: 这就是你的打法

translation.en: That boy do football and basketball. Y'all got nothing on him.
translation.zh: 那个人既玩篮球又玩橄榄球你们都玩不过他

translation.en: Hey, I want you.
translation.zh: 嘿 来我们队吧

translation.en: I want you, boy.
translation.zh: 来我们队吧 伙计

translation.en: Where the police at? Because y'all getting robbed.
translation.zh: 快叫警察吧 你们被打惨了

translation.en: He just schooled you, man.
translation.zh: 他只是在教育你 伙计

translation.en: Y'all see it. Come on, let's get it.
translation.zh: 都看到了吧 你们继续

translation.en: -Hey. -Catch you later.
translation.zh: -嘿-回头见

translation.en: That's how it's done. That's how it's done, boy.
translation.zh: 伙计 你球打得太好了

translation.en: So when you headed up to Oregon?
translation.zh: 你什么时候出发去俄勒冈

translation.en: First thing tomorrow, man.
translation.zh: 明天一早就走

translation.en: Don't forget about us, homes.
translation.zh: 可别忘了家乡和我们啊

translation.en: Course not, baby. Of course not. Come on.
translation.zh: 当然不会 兄弟 当然不会

translation.en: Man, all y'all horrible.
translation.zh: 你们都糟糕透了

translation.en: Just straight garbage on the court, no game.
translation.zh: 球场上的垃圾 别打球了

translation.en: Have you heard from him? Boy's got to get up early in the morning.
translation.zh: 他来过电话了吗？他明天可要早起

translation.en: Okay, Mama.
translation.zh: 知道了 妈

translation.en: Yo, Pops, what's up?
translation.zh: 爸爸 什么事？

translation.en: -You didn't forget to fill the car, did you? -No, I just did. Supreme.
translation.zh: -你没忘记给车加满油吧？-没 刚加满 高级汽油

translation.en: All right. Home in 10.
translation.zh: 好 10点到家

translation.en: He on his way.
translation.zh: 他快回来了

translation.en: Let me go get his cornbread ready.
translation.zh: 我去把玉米面包弄好

translation.en: Yo, what did you forget?
translation.zh: 嘿 你忘记啥了？

translation.en: It's me, coz.
translation.zh: 表兄 是我

translation.en: Lamarco, you high, dog?
translation.zh: 拉马克 你喝高了？

translation.en: I lost my ride, man.
translation.zh: 兄弟 我把车丢了

translation.en: Where are you?
translation.zh: 你在哪里？

translation.en: -Yo, Lamarco. Come on, man. -One minute. Let me cop these digits.
translation.zh: -拉马克 快下来-等我一分钟 我记个电话号码

translation.en: -Get them and come on. I gotta get home. -One minute, coz.
translation.zh: -快点 我得赶紧回家-一分钟 堂兄

translation.en: You gonna give me them digits, or what? You see my ride here.
translation.zh: 你到底给不给我号码？有人来接我了

translation.en: Lamarco, come on!
translation.zh: 拉马克 快点

translation.en: I'm coming. I'm gonna call you.
translation.zh: 我来了 我会打给你的

translation.en: School me, player?
translation.zh: 小子 你敢教育我？

translation.en: Nah, school you.
translation.zh: 现在 我来教育教育你

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: Call an ambulance, man!
translation.zh: 快叫救护车

translation.en: We have an 18-year-old African-American with gunshot wounds.
translation.zh: 一位18岁的非裔美国男孩被枪击

translation.en: Mama, you stay here.
translation.zh: 妈 你待在这里

translation.en: Oh, God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Jesus Christ. No, no.
translation.zh: 天啊 不

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no! That's my son!
translation.zh: 不 这是我儿子

translation.en: -It's all right. -No!
translation.zh: -冷静点-不

translation.en: Let me go! Let me go!
translation.zh: 放开我

translation.en: T.K.!
translation.zh: TK！

translation.en: T.K.! That's my son!
translation.zh: TK！那是我儿子！

translation.en: Is that our baby?
translation.zh: 那是我们的宝贝吗？

translation.en: Oh, no! Oh, no!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Hold on, help is on the way
translation.zh: 坚持住 救助马上就来

translation.en: God hasn't forgotten you
translation.zh: 上帝没有忘记你

translation.en: Be not dismayed
translation.zh: 别灰心

translation.en: Through the rough times in your life
translation.zh: 熬过最困苦的时期

translation.en: Everything will be all right
translation.zh: 一切都会好的

translation.en: Just hold on 'Cause help is on the way
translation.zh: 坚持住 救助马上就到

translation.en: And without further ado, Coach Bob Ladouceur.
translation.zh: 无需多言 有请鲍伯拉杜尔斯教练

translation.en: Thank you, Coach Ladouceur.
translation.zh: 谢谢 拉杜尔斯教练

translation.en: Minister.
translation.zh: 你好 牧师

translation.en: I remember the first time I saw T.K.
translation.zh: 我记得 第一次见到TK的时候

translation.en: He was that...
translation.zh: 他还是

translation.en: ...awkward freshman, all arms and legs, with an infectious smile.
translation.zh: 一个腼腆瘦弱的一年级学生挂着极富感染力的笑容

translation.en: A coach couldn't help but notice the smooth grace of his...
translation.zh: 身为教练 我很快就注意到他优秀的

translation.en: ...athletic ability.
translation.zh: 运动才能

translation.en: People always ask me what it's like to never lose.
translation.zh: 人们总是问我身为常胜将军是什么感觉？

translation.en: Today, I am lost.
translation.zh: 今天 我迷失了

translation.en: Lord, have mercy.
translation.zh: 求主大发慈悲

translation.en: It's as if life has taken more than it gives...
translation.zh: 被生活带走的 似乎比带来的更多

translation.en: ...and I don't know if I can handle it.
translation.zh: 我不知道该如何应对

translation.en: Lord, I'm struggling.
translation.zh: 主啊 我在挣扎

translation.en: I wanna understand why.
translation.zh: 我想弄清楚

translation.en: -Why Terrance? -Yes, Lord.
translation.zh: -为什么要带走特伦斯？-是啊 主

translation.en: Why now?
translation.zh: 为什么是现在？

translation.en: If we are to call ourselves Christians, we cannot ask these questions...
translation.zh: 但我知道 我们身为基督徒不能问出这些问题

translation.en: ...because to do so is to question your benevolence, your divine wisdom.
translation.zh: 因为这就是在质疑你们自己的善行就是质疑神的智慧

translation.en: But today I am lost.
translation.zh: 但是今天 我彻底迷失了

translation.en: Mr. Kelly.
translation.zh: 凯利先生

translation.en: T-Gram.
translation.zh: 小T的奶奶

translation.en: I can't even imagine your pain right now.
translation.zh: 此时此刻我根本无法想象你们的痛苦

translation.en: But you raised the kind of young man we all strive for.
translation.zh: 但你们培养出了一位堪称楷模的年轻人

translation.en: We ask our players...
translation.zh: 我让队员们学习

translation.en: ...to learn and embrace ideals...
translation.zh: 并信奉这些信条

translation.en: ...perfection, commitment...
translation.zh: 至善 奉献

translation.en: ...compassion, brotherhood, faith.
translation.zh: 慈悲 兄弟情 信仰

translation.en: From the first time T.K. came across that field, I saw it.
translation.zh: 第一次在球场上看到TK我就知道

translation.en: A kid whose grace wasn't just athletic...
translation.zh: 这孩子的魅力不止体现在体育方面

translation.en: ...but genuine in so many ways.
translation.zh: 在其他许多方面也是如此真诚

translation.en: He embodied those ideals.
translation.zh: 他体现了这些特质

translation.en: Yes, Lord.
translation.zh: 是啊 主

translation.en: You never gave up on anything or anyone.
translation.zh: 你从来不放弃任何事和任何人

translation.en: And I did not teach you.
translation.zh: （特伦斯莱斯霍姆 信仰之人） 我没有教你这些

translation.en: You taught me.
translation.zh: 是你教会了我

translation.en: Thank you...
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: ...because when on some other day I am lost...
translation.zh: 因为 当我以后再次迷失

translation.en: ...and struggling to keep my faith, I need only remember you.
translation.zh: 为是否要继续抱定信仰而挣扎时 我只需要想想你

translation.en: And for reasons we are not privy to, God wanted T.K. home.
translation.zh: 因为种种原因上帝让TK回家了

translation.en: He is with him now.
translation.zh: 主与他同在

translation.en: May God bless you.
translation.zh: 愿上帝保佑你

translation.en: Cam.
translation.zh: 卡姆

translation.en: Doesn't make no sense, coach.
translation.zh: 这完全说不通 教练

translation.en: I don't know what I'm supposed to do anymore.
translation.zh: 我根本不知道该做什么

translation.en: You stick to the plan.
translation.zh: 你坚持你们的计划

translation.en: Go to Oregon.
translation.zh: 去俄勒冈

translation.en: Mowing the lawn? What are you doing out here?
translation.zh: 在除草？你在这儿干嘛呢？

translation.en: Dancing at our wedding.
translation.zh: 在我们的婚礼上跳舞

translation.en: With your dad.
translation.zh: 跟你父亲

translation.en: He grins, looks over. You were talking with the priest.
translation.zh: 他笑着 看看周围你正在跟牧师交谈

translation.en: I remember, he leans in and said:
translation.zh: 我记得 他侧过身来说

translation.en: "If you didn't know better, which one puts the collar on every morning?"
translation.zh: “如果你都不了解谁会每天早晨为他系上领带？”

translation.en: The music stops.
translation.zh: 音乐停了

translation.en: The dance is over.
translation.zh: 舞蹈停了

translation.en: And I'm heading over to rescue you.
translation.zh: 我正要过去把你救出来的时候

translation.en: And he said something I still remember.
translation.zh: 他说了一句话 我现在还记得

translation.en: What's that?
translation.zh: 是什么？

translation.en: "I hope you won't be too lonely."
translation.zh: “我希望你不会太孤单”

translation.en: Your dad raised you.
translation.zh: 你父亲养育了你

translation.en: He loved you...
translation.zh: 他爱你

translation.en: ...but when he died...
translation.zh: 可是直到他去世

translation.en: ...I think he felt like he didn't really know you.
translation.zh: 我认为他还是觉得自己不够了解你

translation.en: Till a minute ago, I thought that might happen to me too.
translation.zh: 直到刚才 我还觉得这可能也发生在了我自己身上

translation.en: I was sitting up, watching you sleep, and it hit me.
translation.zh: 我坐起来 看着睡着的你 忽然就觉得

translation.en: Some people don't know who they are...
translation.zh: 有些人并不知道他们是谁

translation.en: ...all that they have.
translation.zh: 他们拥有什么

translation.en: They just know something's missing.
translation.zh: 他们只知道 有什么东西失去了

translation.en: So I was just sitting out here...
translation.zh: 所以 我坐在这里

translation.en: ...getting ready to let you go again.
translation.zh: 准备好让你再次离开

translation.en: No, still way too slow.
translation.zh: 不行 还是太慢了

translation.en: You need to blow off the ball. Faster step. Strike with intent.
translation.zh: 你们要把球发射出去步伐要更快 要有目的地打击

translation.en: On Friday, we play a football team that's been preparing for this game for a year.
translation.zh: 周五 我们有场比赛对方为这场比赛准备了一年 整整一年！

translation.en: You're not hitting with intensity, conditioning with discipline.
translation.zh: 打击力度还不够纪律也不够严明

translation.en: Salinas, pull your weight. Come on.
translation.zh: 萨利纳斯 加重量 加油

translation.en: Oh, you're dogging it. You're dogging it.
translation.zh: 你跟狗爬似的

translation.en: -Commitment. -Bellevue is bigger and stronger than us.
translation.zh: -全心投入-贝尔维尤队比以前更强大了

translation.en: Accountability. Perfect effort. Finally, love.
translation.zh: 责任感 拼尽全力 最后则是爱

translation.en: This bond is what has led Spartans to achieve far more than anyone...
translation.zh: 这条纽带让无数斯巴达人取得了让其他人

translation.en: ...including themselves, believed they were capable of.
translation.zh: 甚至他们自己都难以置信的成绩

translation.en: Six, seven.
translation.zh: 六 七

translation.en: Without it, you may continue to win games.
translation.zh: 丢掉这些 你可能会继续赢下比赛

translation.en: Rep it out, Tayshon. Four more.
translation.zh: 继续 泰兴 再做四个

translation.en: But you will have lost the chance to become Spartans.
translation.zh: 但你永远成不了真正的斯巴达人

translation.en: Eight's good.
translation.zh: 八个就够了

translation.en: Welcome to Seattle, where the 2004 season opens...
translation.zh: 欢迎来到西雅图2004赛季开幕比赛即将开始

translation.en: ...with a matchup between two of the best teams.
translation.zh: 由两支最好的国内球队奉献一场势均力敌的比赛

translation.en: Come on!
translation.zh: 加油！

translation.en: Let's go, let's go, let's go!
translation.zh: 冲啊！

translation.en: The powerhouse De La Salle Spartans and their national record...
translation.zh: 劲旅德拉萨尔斯巴达人队保持着全国纪录

translation.en: -...151-game winning streak... -Keep the streak alive.
translation.zh: -151场比赛的连胜-延续纪录

translation.en: ...taking on defending Washington State champs, Bellevue.
translation.zh: 正在防守华盛顿州冠军贝尔维尤队

translation.en: Down, set, hut!
translation.zh: 下蹲 预备 开球

translation.en: Strong right, lead at two. Veer, pass, drag. Let's go.
translation.zh: 右路强攻 推进到两码线转身 传球 拖拽 去吧

translation.en: Strong left! Strong left!
translation.zh: 左路强攻

translation.en: -Open back 11. Back 11. -Down, set, hut!
translation.zh: -回到11码 回到11码-下蹲 预备 开球

translation.en: Rick Salinas throws a perfect pass...
translation.zh: 里克萨利纳斯传出一记好球

translation.en: ...connecting with Danny Ladouceur for a 13-yard gain.
translation.zh: 帮助丹尼拉杜尔斯向前推进了13码

translation.en: Sixteen mid-line on one. Ready?
translation.zh: 一次推进16码到中线准备好了吗？

translation.en: Go get them, Beast.
translation.zh: 打败他们 野兽

translation.en: Chris Ryan. This man has the size and speed to play anywhere in the country.
translation.zh: 克里斯莱恩 身材与速度俱佳能胜任何国内一支球队的比赛

translation.en: Red dog! Red dog! Set, hut-hut!
translation.zh: 红狗战术 预备 开球

translation.en: Go, go, go! Come on, Chris! Come on, Chris!
translation.zh: 冲啊 加油 克里斯 冲 克里斯

translation.en: Come on, Beast! Come on, Beast! Come on, Beast!
translation.zh: 加油 小野兽！

translation.en: That's it! Yeah!
translation.zh: 就是这样 太棒了

translation.en: Chris Ryan, showing off his ability, breaks a 45-yard run...
translation.zh: 克里斯莱恩展现了他的实力他完成了45码的跑动

translation.en: ...to give De La Salle a 7-to-0 lead.
translation.zh: 为德拉萨尔取得七比零领先

translation.en: That's a great run, but our left tackle needs to seal that backer better.
translation.zh: 这次跑动很棒 不过我们的左截锋需要更好地防住那个后卫

translation.en: Ryan has been a scoring machine, amassing 52 touchdowns...
translation.zh: 莱恩是一架得分机器在二年级和三年级的赛季中

translation.en: ...in his sophomore and junior seasons.
translation.zh: 他已经积累了52次达阵

translation.en: He is now 36 touchdowns away...
translation.zh: 现在 他距离打破

translation.en: ...from breaking the California career touchdown record.
translation.zh: 加州的达阵得分纪录只差36次达阵

translation.en: Twenty-two. Hut, set, hut!
translation.zh: 战术22 开球

translation.en: Beaser!
translation.zh: 毕瑟尔！

translation.en: This is like the drill we run every day at practice!
translation.zh: 这就像我们每天训练的那样

translation.en: Shed that block and get to the ball carrier!
translation.zh: 你要摆脱阻挡 到达持球队员那里

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: They're changing it up.
translation.zh: 他们在改变战术

translation.en: They're in man to man, then dropping to cover two.
translation.zh: 他们先是人盯人然后由两名队员保护后场进行防守

translation.en: Why don't you simplify it? Read the free safety.
translation.zh: 为何不简化一下来看呢？看看游卫

translation.en: Free safety's gonna tell you everything. What? Someone break one?
translation.zh: -游卫的活动会告诉你一切-怎么？有人成功突破了？

translation.en: Stop him! Stop him!
translation.zh: 拦住他！

translation.en: Get after him!
translation.zh: 追上他！

translation.en: Jeez!
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: Bellevue's Taylor King breaks a 76-yard touchdown.
translation.zh: 贝尔维尤的泰勒金完成了一次76码的达阵

translation.en: This Bellevue team is not afraid of De La Salle.
translation.zh: 这支贝尔维尤一点都不怕德拉萨尔

translation.en: We may just have a game here.
translation.zh: 比赛才刚刚开始

translation.en: And yet another completion. First down, Bellevue.
translation.zh: 再次完成接球 贝尔维尤队拿到首攻

translation.en: They're playing exactly like us.
translation.zh: 他们的打法跟我们一样

translation.en: This Wolverine passing attack is shredding De La Salle.
translation.zh: 金刚狼的传球进攻撕开了德拉萨尔的防守

translation.en: It's a three-deep and you got beat?
translation.zh: 三人回撤防守后场 你居然被打穿了

translation.en: Your responsibility is the quarterback when they run the option.
translation.zh: 当他们没得选择的时候你的责任是阻止对方四分卫

translation.en: Right? We practiced all of this, come on, now!
translation.zh: 对吧？这些状况我们全都训练过 加油！

translation.en: You have to break down to make that stop.
translation.zh: 我们需要有所突破 扭转局势

translation.en: Don't get caught flat-footed.
translation.zh: 不要毫无准备地被动挨打

translation.en: No, no, no!
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Stop him! Stop him!
translation.zh: 拦住他

translation.en: Oh, God!
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Here's something nobody expected.
translation.zh: 没人预料到会出现这种状况

translation.en: The Wolverines are controlling the line of scrimmage against De La Salle.
translation.zh: 在这场与德拉萨尔的比赛中金刚狼统治了攻防两端的前线

translation.en: They're beating us off the ball on every snap.
translation.zh: 他们每档攻防都把我们打得落花流水

translation.en: -Down. -Blue 22! Blue 22!
translation.zh: -蹲下-蓝22

translation.en: Set.
translation.zh: 准备

translation.en: Go left! Go left!
translation.zh: 攻左路

translation.en: Hut!
translation.zh: 开球

translation.en: Bellevue scores to give the Washington State champions...
translation.zh: 华盛顿州冠军贝尔维尤队现在以28比7

translation.en: ...a 28-to-7 lead over powerhouse De La Salle.
translation.zh: 领先劲旅德拉萨尔队

translation.en: We're gonna lose.
translation.zh: 我们要输了

translation.en: Hit Danny on a 12-yard curl in the seam between the linebacker and the safety.
translation.zh: 在线卫和游卫之间的空挡让丹尼迂回推进12码 去吧

translation.en: Down, set, hut!
translation.zh: 下蹲 准备 开球

translation.en: Danny Ladouceur drops a pass. His dad will not be happy about that.
translation.zh: 丹尼拉杜尔斯没接住传球他父亲可不会为这而高兴的

translation.en: Gotta get it to the players.
translation.zh: 应该传给其他人的

translation.en: He's gotta catch it, Bev.
translation.zh: 他该接住的 毕芙

translation.en: Ready. Set, hut!
translation.zh: 预备 开球

translation.en: Ladouceur's hit and coughs up the ball!
translation.zh: 拉杜尔斯被撞倒 球也掉了

translation.en: Gotta hold on to that ball, Danny!
translation.zh: 抓紧球啊 丹尼

translation.en: Bellevue recovers. Bellevue recovers.
translation.zh: 贝尔维尤抢到球权

translation.en: -I don't care how good you think you are! -I'm the best receiver on this team.
translation.zh: -我不在乎你觉得自己有多优秀-我是队里最好的接球手

translation.en: I ran my route, they attacked, man. Ran the ball right by you.
translation.zh: 我按照自己的路线跑着他们进攻 让球跟你一起跑

translation.en: -Come on! Let's go, let's go! -Eight, seven...
translation.zh: -振作起来 加油-八 七

translation.en: ...six, five, four...
translation.zh: -六 五 四…

translation.en: -Down, set, hut! -...three, two, one.
translation.zh: -下蹲 开球-三 二 一

translation.en: And that's it. The streak is over! The streak is over!
translation.zh: 比赛结束 连胜纪录终结了纪录终结了

translation.en: The longest winning streak in sports history is now over...
translation.zh: 体育史上最长的连胜纪录现在终结了

translation.en: ...as the Bellevue Wolverines have shocked the De La Salle Spartans...
translation.zh: 贝尔维尤金刚狼队给了德拉萨尔斯巴达人队

translation.en: ...in perhaps the biggest upset in high-school football history.
translation.zh: 或许是高中橄榄球历史上的最沉重一击

translation.en: Are you okay? It's okay.
translation.zh: 你还好吗？没关系的

translation.en: Hey, hey! We don't do that here.
translation.zh: 嘿 我们不那么做的

translation.en: We don't do that.
translation.zh: 我们不这么做

translation.en: Reporters, friends, family, strangers.
translation.zh: 记者 朋友 家人 陌生人

translation.en: They're all gonna ask the same thing:
translation.zh: 他们都会问你们同一个问题

translation.en: "What happened?"
translation.zh: “发生什么事了？”

translation.en: This is a question that's gonna follow you.
translation.zh: 这个问题会一直跟着你们

translation.en: "How did you lose the streak?"
translation.zh: “你们是怎样丢掉连胜纪录的？”

translation.en: And every time, you're gonna answer the truth:
translation.zh: 每一次 你们都要告诉他们事实

translation.en: "Bellevue played better than us and we lost a high-school football game."
translation.zh: “贝尔维尤队比我们打得好所以我们输掉了这场高中橄榄球赛”

translation.en: That's football.
translation.zh: 但输掉的只是橄榄球比赛

translation.en: But it's not you.
translation.zh: 不是你们

translation.en: Don't let a game define who you are.
translation.zh: 不要让一场比赛定义你的人生

translation.en: Let the way you live your lives do that.
translation.zh: 这该由你对待生活的态度来决定

translation.en: Coach.
translation.zh: 教练

translation.en: I truly believe that life's most impressionable lessons...
translation.zh: 我十分相信人生中印象最为深刻的教训

translation.en: ...are ones where something bad happens to you...
translation.zh: 是坏事降临在你头上

translation.en: ...or something challenging confronts you.
translation.zh: 或是你面临挑战的时候

translation.en: No one can climb into your head and hear what that little voice is saying to you.
translation.zh: 没人能进入你的脑海听到那个声音对你说了什么

translation.en: Is it saying, "Oh, no, we lost the streak"?
translation.zh: 它可能在说“天哪 我们丢掉了连胜纪录”

translation.en: Well, what's it gonna say?
translation.zh: 那它究竟会说什么呢？

translation.en: After today, you're gonna find out a lot about yourselves.
translation.zh: 经历过今天 你们都将更加清晰地认识自己

translation.en: And you know something, we're all gonna find out what this team is made of.
translation.zh: 我们大家也都将会发现这支队伍的核心价值

translation.en: The effort you put in during the off-season was commendable.
translation.zh: （德拉萨尔对抗克莱顿谷） 你们在休赛期付出的一切努力都是值得嘉奖的

translation.en: But it has not translated onto the field.
translation.zh: 但成果并没有体现在赛场上

translation.en: You've got to decide what you wanna be.
translation.zh: 你们想成为怎样的人是由你们来决定的

translation.en: I get the feeling from you as a team that you just wanna hop on that throne...
translation.zh: 因为据我感觉 你们这支球队

translation.en: ...and place the championship ring on your finger.
translation.zh: 只是想跳上王位宝座戴上冠军戒指

translation.en: That you're at De La Salle and deserve that.
translation.zh: 因为你在德拉萨尔打球这是你应得的

translation.en: For the most part we're inconsistent, mistake-prone, ragged...
translation.zh: 但最大的问题是我们不团结 爱犯错误 人心不齐

translation.en: ...and not very physical.
translation.zh: 还禁不起冲撞

translation.en: That's where we are.
translation.zh: 这就是我们的实力

translation.en: As much as you don't wanna hear it, that's my assessment.
translation.zh: 虽然你们很不想听 但这就是我的看法

translation.en: Do I feel like you can pull this off and earn the right to that throne?
translation.zh: 要问我认为你们能不能闯过难关赢得登上宝座的权利呢

translation.en: -Yeah, I do. -Attaboy, attaboy.
translation.zh: -我觉得能-太棒了

translation.en: I'm not hoping you play well against Clayton Valley.
translation.zh: 我并不指望你们能跟克莱顿谷队打出一场精彩的比赛

translation.en: You have to. You have to play well this week.
translation.zh: 这是你们必须做到的这周你们必须认真比赛

translation.en: Even if you step it up and play at your ability level, it still won't be easy.
translation.zh: 就算你们能完全发挥出现在的水平赢球也不容易

translation.en: You're gonna have to fight for victories in those games.
translation.zh: 你们必须自己争取这些比赛的胜利

translation.en: All right, that's it, that's it!
translation.zh: 好 就是这样

translation.en: Oh, he's got a seam! Go, go, go!
translation.zh: 他得到了空挡 加油！

translation.en: -Nice work. -Oh, for--!
translation.zh: -干得好-噢

translation.en: Despite a well-played game, De La Salle comes up short...
translation.zh: 尽管发挥出色德拉萨尔队还是没能赢球

translation.en: ...and after two games, is still winless in this young season.
translation.zh: 两场比赛过后他们这个赛季依然没能尝到胜利的滋味

translation.en: Bob Ladouceur's gonna have to figure something out to get this team on track...
translation.zh: 鲍伯拉杜尔斯必须想办法让队伍重回正轨了

translation.en: ...if they plan on making it to the playoffs this year.
translation.zh: 如果他们今年还打算打进季后赛的话

translation.en: Pick up your heads.
translation.zh: 抬起头来

translation.en: Meet me at the locker room tomorrow.
translation.zh: 明早在更衣室集合

translation.en: Eight a.m.
translation.zh: 早上八点

translation.en: What's up, Alex?
translation.zh: 阿莱克斯 你还好吗？

translation.en: -Miss you. I'm all sweaty. -It's okay. It was a tough game.
translation.zh: -想你 我身上全是汗-没关系 亲爱的 比赛很辛苦

translation.en: Party is tomorrow, if you wanna go.
translation.zh: 明天有聚会 你想来吗？

translation.en: Maybe. I don't know. If you do.
translation.zh: 可能吧 我不知道 你去我就去吧

translation.en: -Are you kidding me? -Dad, please.
translation.zh: -你在逗我吗？-爸爸 别这样

translation.en: You let some punk pull you down at the two-yard line.
translation.zh: 你居然被一个废物放倒在两码线那里

translation.en: -I scored three touchdowns. -How many did you promise?
translation.zh: -我有三个达阵-才三个？你是怎么跟我保证的？

translation.en: -Mr. Ryan, please. -Laurie, stop.
translation.zh: -莱恩先生 别这样-劳里 你别管

translation.en: Forty-one blast. Run it, now.
translation.zh: 跑卫强冲 现在就做

translation.en: -Dad, it's midnight. I'm tired. -So am I.
translation.zh: -爸爸 现在是半夜 我已经很累了-我也是

translation.en: -Forty-one blast. Run it, now. -You run it.
translation.zh: -跑卫强冲 现在就做-要跑你跑吧

translation.en: You listen close.
translation.zh: 你给我听好了

translation.en: I want that record.
translation.zh: 我要那个纪录

translation.en: He's not gonna get it for you with a busted rib.
translation.zh: 他肋骨受伤可就没法替你破纪录了

translation.en: Now let him go.
translation.zh: 放开他

translation.en: Hey, coach. Let's you and me huddle up for a second, okay?
translation.zh: 嘿 教练 跟我聊聊怎么样？

translation.en: I don't usually huddle up with parents, Mick.
translation.zh: 我不怎么跟学生家长闲聊 米克

translation.en: You think this is gonna freak them out?
translation.zh: 你觉得这能让他们吓到吗？

translation.en: I certainly hope so.
translation.zh: 希望吧

translation.en: -Good morning, Carol. -Hi, Bob.
translation.zh: -早安 卡洛-嗨 鲍伯

translation.en: Nurse Ballard is a friend of mine. She's in charge of the entire nursing staff.
translation.zh: 巴拉德护士是我的朋友她管理着这里的护理人员

translation.en: Today, we will be following her orders.
translation.zh: 今天 我们要听她的指挥

translation.en: Coach Lad and I worked at the Juvenile Detention Center in Richmond.
translation.zh: 拉德教练和我在里士满的青少年拘留中心共事过

translation.en: It was a little longer ago than I'd rather admit.
translation.zh: 那是很长时间以前的事情了

translation.en: So you guys play a tough game. Anybody ever been injured?
translation.zh: 你们的比赛相当激烈有哪些人受过伤呢

translation.en: You've never been injured?
translation.zh: 你从来没受过伤

translation.en: It's part of the game. You don't think about it, you bounce back.
translation.zh: 受伤是比赛的一部分用不着去想 很快就恢复了

translation.en: You're very brave.
translation.zh: 你很勇敢啊

translation.en: This is not that.
translation.zh: 但这里情况不同

translation.en: Here, nobody bounces. Break into three groups. When you hear your name...
translation.zh: 在这里 没人很快就能恢复你们要分成三组 听到你们的名字时

translation.en: ...follow the nurse who called it to the appropriate unit. Let's go.
translation.zh: 就跟着点名的护士来到你所在的小组 走吧

translation.en: Nurse Adams is in charge of the Recovery Ward, and she will take over from here.
translation.zh: 这位是主管康复病房的亚当斯护士在这里 你们归她管

translation.en: Good afternoon, gentlemen. Welcome to the VA Recovery Ward.
translation.zh: 先生们 下午好 欢迎来到康复病房

translation.en: So here we specialize in transplants...
translation.zh: 在这里进行康复的都是移植

translation.en: ...amputations and general rehabilitation for limb recovery.
translation.zh: 截肢和一般的肢体康复病人

translation.en: Our focus here is on full recovery, body and spirit.
translation.zh: 我们的目标是身心全方位的完全康复

translation.en: If this is too hard for anybody, don't come in.
translation.zh: 如果有人承受不住 就不要进来了

translation.en: Why would it be?
translation.zh: 怎么会呢？

translation.en: All our patients are here for rehabilitation.
translation.zh: 这里的所有病人都是为康复而来的

translation.en: Our job is to help them recover from injuries received during combat.
translation.zh: 我们的工作 就是帮助他们恢复搏斗中受的伤

translation.en: It's long and difficult, but we're dedicated to getting them back to functioning lives.
translation.zh: 这是个长而艰难的过程 但我们努力帮他们恢复到完全正常的生理机能

translation.en: -Hey, May. -Hey.
translation.zh: -你好 梅-你好

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: I'll be right there.
translation.zh: 我马上过去

translation.en: Hey, would you do me a favor? Would you finish up?
translation.zh: 嘿 能帮我个忙吗？替他擦完身体

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: What are you looking at?
translation.zh: 你看什么呢？

translation.en: Oh, no, no, I just....
translation.zh: 没什么 我只是…

translation.en: -You just what? -Nothing.
translation.zh: -只是什么？-没什么

translation.en: What's the matter, boy?
translation.zh: 到底怎么了 孩子？

translation.en: Get on. Pace me.
translation.zh: 上来 跟上我的脚步

translation.en: -What? -You do speak English, right?
translation.zh: -什么？-你会说英语吧？

translation.en: Get on, pace me.
translation.zh: 上来 跟上我的脚步

translation.en: What? What did I do? Did I hurt you?
translation.zh: 怎么了？我怎么了？弄疼了吗？

translation.en: No, I'm just messing with you, man.
translation.zh: 嘿 我只是在吓唬你 伙计

translation.en: I can't feel anything.
translation.zh: 我什么也感觉不到

translation.en: Man, I--
translation.zh: 嘿 我…

translation.en: Sometimes my legs hurt so bad, I'd wish I didn't feel anything.
translation.zh: 有的时候我的腿疼得很厉害就会希望我什么都感觉不到

translation.en: No, you don't.
translation.zh: 不 你不希望

translation.en: No, I don't.
translation.zh: 对 我不希望

translation.en: -What's wrong with you, boy? You blind? -My bad, man. I didn't see you.
translation.zh: -孩子 怎么回事？你瞎啊-对不起 我的错 我没看到你

translation.en: No, man. I swear I didn't even see you. Hey, what the--? Hey! Hey, man!
translation.zh: 我发誓我真的没看见你嘿 怎么回事…嘿

translation.en: Is that--? Was that pee?
translation.zh: 这…是尿吗？

translation.en: Well, it sure ain't no Gatorade.
translation.zh: 反正不是佳得乐

translation.en: Heck, no!
translation.zh: 见鬼 不！

translation.en: Hey, nurse!
translation.zh: 嘿 护士

translation.en: Come on, man!
translation.zh: 天啊 伙计！

translation.en: Come on, Danny. You gotta speed this up.
translation.zh: 来 丹尼 给你加加速

translation.en: All right. Let him catch up, though.
translation.zh: 挺好 让他追你吧

translation.en: Oh, great. You're a real gentleman.
translation.zh: 噢 不错 真是个绅士

translation.en: Oh, baby.
translation.zh: 噢 伙计

translation.en: Stop. Salinas. Quit it.
translation.zh: 停 萨利纳斯 别按了

translation.en: -Salinas, enough. -I don't know if it is fast enough.
translation.zh: -够了 萨利纳斯-我都不知道够不够快呢

translation.en: Show me what you got.
translation.zh: 给我露两手

translation.en: Let's go, Danny. Show him what you got.
translation.zh: 来吧 丹尼 给他露两手

translation.en: One night we get overrun. I just curled up, waiting to die.
translation.zh: 有天晚上 我们被击溃了我正缩成一团等死呢

translation.en: Till somebody dragged me into this deserted mosque.
translation.zh: 然后有人把我拖进了一座废弃的清真寺

translation.en: I look at the guy who just saved my butt. He's just some hillbilly kid from Arkansas.
translation.zh: 我看了看救了我性命的那家伙他就是个阿肯色州的乡下人

translation.en: Hey, at least you got out.
translation.zh: 至少你回来了

translation.en: If they could put me back together, I'd go back today.
translation.zh: 如果他们能把我四肢拼起来我现在已经回去了

translation.en: For what?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: My unit. Listen, half of them are still over there.
translation.zh: 为我的连队他们中的一半人还在那里呢

translation.en: That don't make no sense.
translation.zh: 这没道理啊

translation.en: It's simple. Over there, who you are in the world don't matter.
translation.zh: 很简单在那里 你是谁并不重要

translation.en: Fighting for your country don't matter.
translation.zh: 为国而战也不重要

translation.en: What does?
translation.zh: 什么重要？

translation.en: The guy next to you.
translation.zh: 你身边的伙伴

translation.en: It's a brotherhood.
translation.zh: 兄弟情

translation.en: Let's go, boys. You're running. Come on.
translation.zh: 快啊 孩子 继续跑 加油

translation.en: Come on, Danny. Spartans for life, baby.
translation.zh: 加油 丹尼 一生都是斯巴达人

translation.en: Live together. Die together.
translation.zh: 同生共死

translation.en: Pick it up. Pick it up. Pick it up.
translation.zh: 加速

translation.en: You wanna go faster?
translation.zh: 你想更快点

translation.en: Let's go faster.
translation.zh: 那就更快点吧

translation.en: Don't let us down, baby. Come on.
translation.zh: -兄弟 别让我们失望-加油

translation.en: Let's go, baby. Come on, Danny. You got this, dog. Don't stop, baby. Come on.
translation.zh: 继续 兄弟 加油 丹尼都到这份儿上了 别停 加油

translation.en: Do not stop on me. Do not stop.
translation.zh: 不能停 千万别停

translation.en: You're a Spartan. Don't stop, Danny.
translation.zh: 你是斯巴达人 别停 丹尼

translation.en: I can't. I can't.
translation.zh: 跑不动了

translation.en: -What? -He's gonna go forever.
translation.zh: -怎么了？-他会永远跑下去

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Not forever, Danny.
translation.zh: 不是永远 丹尼

translation.en: Just a little more than you.
translation.zh: 只是比你跑得远一点

translation.en: Long Beach Poly.
translation.zh: 长滩保利队

translation.en: By every measure, the best high-school football team in the nation.
translation.zh: 各方面来看都是国内最好的高中橄榄球队

translation.en: Offensive line, average over 300 pounds.
translation.zh: 进攻前线平均体重136公斤

translation.en: Their starters. Beaser.
translation.zh: 首发队员 毕瑟尔

translation.en: Meet Buster Matthews.
translation.zh: 认识一下浑人马修斯

translation.en: Three hundred and thirty pounds of pure aggression.
translation.zh: 体重150公斤 极具攻击性

translation.en: Poly runs 60 percent of their plays behind him.
translation.zh: 保利队百分之六十的路面进攻都在他的方向进行

translation.en: And you're gonna face him the whole game.
translation.zh: 整场比赛你都会跟他对位

translation.en: But we have speed, right?
translation.zh: 不过我们还有速度 对吧？

translation.en: Their number-one wideout clocks a 4.4 40.
translation.zh: 他们的首发接球手40码冲刺成绩为4.4秒

translation.en: I don't think we have anyone that fast.
translation.zh: 我不觉得你们当中有谁比他更快

translation.en: Their key player? Strong safety Darnell Bing.
translation.zh: 他们的核心队员强卫达内尔宾

translation.en: Just committed to SC and plays like he's been there three years.
translation.zh: 他刚刚被南加州大学录取就跟在队里打了三年球似的

translation.en: Tayshon. You're a better match for this guy's speed.
translation.zh: 泰兴 你能更好地跟上这家伙的速度

translation.en: You're gonna start against Poly.
translation.zh: 跟保利的比赛你首发

translation.en: You're going into the most physically demanding moment of your life.
translation.zh: 不过现在 你们要经历一生中最为艰苦卓绝的体能训练

translation.en: Drive, drive, drive!
translation.zh: 跑！
