translation.en: Let me go again! Let me go again!
translation.zh: 让我再来一次 再来一次

translation.en: Way to go, Beaser! Way to go! All the way to the line.
translation.zh: 加把劲 毕瑟尔 就快到终点了

translation.en: One tradition...
translation.zh: （加州长滩）

translation.en: ...that defined this program is the willingness of our players...
translation.zh: 就是在赛前动员会之后

translation.en: ...to share their emotions at the end of these meetings.
translation.zh: 由队员们分享自己的情感

translation.en: This team hasn't done that.
translation.zh: 这支队伍还没有做过这一项

translation.en: You guys are still carrying around the stigma of losing the streak. Forget that.
translation.zh: 你们还都背负着失去连胜纪录的阴影 忘掉吧

translation.en: Forget it.
translation.zh: 忘掉吧

translation.en: Open up.
translation.zh: 敞开心扉

translation.en: Talk to each other.
translation.zh: 大家好好聊一聊

translation.en: My brother was captain of the 2000 team.
translation.zh: 我哥是2000年那支队伍的队长

translation.en: In four years, he never lost one game.
translation.zh: 四年来 他从没输过一场比赛

translation.en: When we blew the streak, I couldn't look him in the eye.
translation.zh: 我们失去了连胜纪录的时候我都无法直视他的眼睛

translation.en: I'm done with that.
translation.zh: 我受够这种感觉了

translation.en: Everything we've been through was for a reason:
translation.zh: 自拉德教练心脏病发作之后我们所经历的一切都缘出有因

translation.en: To bring us together.
translation.zh: 自拉德教练心脏病发作之后我们所经历的一切都缘出有因 是为了让我们团结一致

translation.en: I love you guys.
translation.zh: 我爱你们

translation.en: I will die on that field before I let you down.
translation.zh: 我宁愿死在球场上也不愿让你们失望

translation.en: Collapse. Not die.
translation.zh: 倒在球场上 死不了

translation.en: It's just a high-school football game.
translation.zh: 这只是场高中橄榄球比赛

translation.en: I've been on this team four years.
translation.zh: 我在这支队伍里待了四年

translation.en: I've never once played in a varsity football game.
translation.zh: 从来没打过一场高中校队比赛

translation.en: I mean, I'm not good enough.
translation.zh: 我的意思是 我不够优秀

translation.en: And that's okay, because the greatest moments of my life...
translation.zh: 这没什么因为我生命中最棒的那些时刻

translation.en: ...were the times I've spent on this team with you.
translation.zh: 都是在这支球队中与你们一起度过的

translation.en: I've never been prouder of anything than being a Spartan.
translation.zh: 没什么比做斯巴达人更让我骄傲的了

translation.en: When we first watched Poly's film, and I saw Buster Matthews...
translation.zh: 我们第一次看保利队的录像我看到浑人马修斯的时候

translation.en: ...I was scared.
translation.zh: 我被吓到了

translation.en: Then I remembered something Coach Lad told us on my first day of practice.
translation.zh: 然后我想起了拉德教练在训练第一天教导我们的

translation.en: "Face your fears."
translation.zh: “直面恐惧”

translation.en: That night I pasted Buster's name and his number on my ceiling above my bed.
translation.zh: 那天晚上 我把浑人的名字和号码贴在了床上方的天花板上

translation.en: And every night since, no matter how tired I was...
translation.zh: 之后的每个晚上 不管我有多累

translation.en: ...I've been saying:
translation.zh: 我都会默念

translation.en: "Buster Matthews, number 79...
translation.zh: “浑人马修斯 79号

translation.en: ...you are mine."
translation.zh: 你是我的猎物”

translation.en: A hundred times every night.
translation.zh: 每天晚上一百遍

translation.en: I promise you, guys.
translation.zh: 兄弟们 我向你们保证

translation.en: We're not gonna lose because of Buster Matthews.
translation.zh: 我们绝不会因为浑人马修斯而输掉比赛

translation.en: My old man is insane.
translation.zh: 我父亲是个疯子

translation.en: My mom used to keep him in line, but he wore her out.
translation.zh: 我母亲曾试图让他保持清醒但他伤透了她的心

translation.en: Once I made the team, I thought it'd be better.
translation.zh: 我来到这支球队时 觉得情况会好转

translation.en: He became an animal.
translation.zh: 但他变本加厉

translation.en: I hated him.
translation.zh: 我恨他

translation.en: Funny thing is, what--
translation.zh: 有趣的是…

translation.en: What saved me was being on this team.
translation.zh: 正是这支队伍拯救了我

translation.en: I used to play as hard as I could because I thought that would make him happy.
translation.zh: 过去 我尽可能的努力训练因为我觉得这能让他开心

translation.en: And then I'd be happy.
translation.zh: 然后我也能开心

translation.en: You guys love me whether I'm scoring touchdowns or not.
translation.zh: 而你们 不管我是否达阵得分都依然爱我

translation.en: I was missing that, and you guys gave it to me.
translation.zh: 我失去的那部分 是你们给予我的

translation.en: I could never repay you for that.
translation.zh: 我永远无以为报

translation.en: But come tomorrow...
translation.zh: 但明天

translation.en: ...I don't play for him.
translation.zh: 我并不是为他而战

translation.en: I play for you.
translation.zh: 我为你们而战

translation.en: Welcome to Veterans Stadium, home of the Long Beach Poly Jackrabbits...
translation.zh: 欢迎来到老兵体育场今天 坐镇主场的长滩保利野兔队

translation.en: ...where the De La Salle Spartans of Concord, California...
translation.zh: 将迎战从加州康拉德

translation.en: ...have traveled to the Southland for this matchup of powerhouse programs.
translation.zh: 来到南方做客的劲旅德拉萨尔斯巴达人队

translation.en: At the end of last season, these were the top two teams...
translation.zh: 上赛季末 这是排名最高的两支队伍

translation.en: ...and this was hyped as the game for the national championship.
translation.zh: 所以本场比赛被认为是全国冠军之争

translation.en: Dude, these guys are giants.
translation.zh: 老兄 这些家伙是巨人啊

translation.en: Poly is riding high on 34 straight victories.
translation.zh: 保利队目前连胜34场 士气高涨

translation.en: De La Salle's 151-game-winning streak ended two weeks ago...
translation.zh: 德拉萨尔的151场不败纪录已于两周前终结

translation.en: ...and the Spartans come into this game with an abysmal 0 and 2 record.
translation.zh: 斯巴达人带着糟糕透顶的两战两负的成绩来到这里

translation.en: This team is struggling and is nowhere as talented...
translation.zh: 球队在低谷苦苦挣扎而且并不像之前的

translation.en: ...as previous De La Salle teams.
translation.zh: 德拉萨尔队那样天才云集

translation.en: This is the toughest game on their schedule...
translation.zh: 这是他们赛程表上最艰难的一场比赛

translation.en: ...and the most pivotal of their season.
translation.zh: 也是这个赛季的关键

translation.en: If they can't get a win...
translation.zh: 如果今天还是难求一胜

translation.en: ...they will go into league play 0 and 3 and with zero momentum.
translation.zh: 他们的联赛成绩可就是毫无起色的三战三负了

translation.en: And here we go.
translation.zh: 现在开始

translation.en: The first nationally televised high-school football game is underway.
translation.zh: 第一场全国电视直播的高中橄榄球比赛正在进行中

translation.en: Ryan takes the opening kickoff.
translation.zh: 莱恩进行开场的开球回攻

translation.en: And it's gonna be hot as the temperature on the field has reached 95 degrees.
translation.zh: 今天天气相当热场上温度高达35摄氏度

translation.en: Poly is big and fast. Their offensive and defensive lines outweigh the Spartans...
translation.zh: 保利的队员体型大 速度快攻防两端的体重都比斯巴达人的队员

translation.en: ...by over 50 pounds per man.
translation.zh: 人均超过23公斤

translation.en: Set, hut!
translation.zh: 准备 开球

translation.en: Chris Ryan gets pounded into the turf.
translation.zh: 克里斯莱恩被撞倒在草皮上

translation.en: That's all you got?
translation.zh: 你们就这点能耐

translation.en: Set, hut!
translation.zh: 准备 开球

translation.zh: 比赛继续 劳拉教练换上了二年级全卫贾森奈特

translation.en: At 257 pounds, this kid is bigger than most pro running backs.
translation.zh: 这个重达117公斤的队员他的体型比大多数职业级跑卫都大

translation.en: Bang them. Do not let them score.
translation.zh: 打击他们 别让他们得分

translation.en: Blue 72. Set, hut!
translation.zh: 蓝72 预备 开球

translation.en: Pass! Pass! Pass!
translation.zh: 他要传球了

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Wow, what a save.
translation.zh: 哇 救得漂亮

translation.en: The tight end was open in the end zone...
translation.zh: 近边锋在达阵内无人盯防

translation.en: ...but Danny Ladouceur comes out of nowhere...
translation.zh: 不过丹尼拉杜尔斯在几乎不可能的情况下飞身冲出

translation.en: -...to make a huge play. -All right.
translation.zh: -完成了关键的防守-还好

translation.en: -Watch the sweep. -Break for 22.
translation.zh: 注意横向跑动路线重点防守22号

translation.en: Set, hut!
translation.zh: 准备 开球

translation.en: Spartan linebacker Davis makes another big stop, but Chris Ryan is down.
translation.zh: 斯巴达人的线卫戴维斯又一次拦住了对方 不过克里斯莱恩倒地

translation.en: This would be a huge loss for De La Salle.
translation.zh: 这会是德拉萨尔队的巨大损失

translation.en: -Let me see. Let me see. -Get away.
translation.zh: -我看看-走开

translation.en: Get out. Get out, come on.
translation.zh: 下去吧

translation.en: Only way I'm going out of this game is on a stretcher.
translation.zh: 我离场的唯一方式就是躺在担架上

translation.en: -All right, hold on. -Fourth and goal, folks.
translation.zh: 好吧 坚持住四档达阵攻势 观众们

translation.en: This game has come down to one play.
translation.zh: 这场比赛的胜负在此一举

translation.en: A critical play, not just for the game, but for the rest of the Spartans' season.
translation.zh: 这次关键的进攻 不止对这场比赛而言更是斯巴达人接下来整个赛季的关键

translation.en: Poly lines up in a Power I.
translation.zh: 保利队摆出强力“I”字阵型

translation.en: Green 37. Green 37.
Down.
translation.zh: 下蹲

translation.en: Forty back. Watch out for 2.
translation.zh: 回撤40 注意二号

translation.en: Come on, D. Come on, D.
translation.zh: 防守组 加油

translation.en: Yeah! Yeah!
translation.zh: 好耶！

translation.en: Yeah, Spartans! Let's go!
translation.zh: 斯巴达人赢了

translation.en: De La Salle started their season 0 and 2 and lost their win streak...
translation.zh: 德拉萨尔队新赛季开场两战两负还丢掉了连胜纪录

translation.en: ...but have come back to stun the football world...
translation.zh: 不过他们击败了全国第一的球队

translation.en: ...by knocking off the number-one rated team in the country.
translation.zh: 宣告了王者回归橄榄球世界

translation.en: Folks, I have played football and gone home exhausted...
translation.zh: 观众们 我曾打过橄榄球然后筋疲力尽地回家过

translation.en: ...I have broadcast games and gone home elated...
translation.zh: 我曾播报比赛然后筋疲力尽地回家过

translation.en: ...but today, I go home inspired.
translation.zh: 不过今天 我会神采飞扬地回家

translation.en: The De La Salle Spartans have a new lease on life...
translation.zh: 随着德拉萨尔斯巴达人队重回北加州联赛

translation.en: ...as they go into league games in Northern California.
translation.zh: 他们也学到了人生中的关键一课

translation.en: Hey, coach. Coach Ladouceur. Can I get a comment?
translation.zh: 嘿 拉杜尔斯教练能评价一下比赛吗？

translation.en: Danny.
translation.zh: 丹尼

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey, Dad.
translation.zh: -嘿-嘿 爸爸

translation.en: You made a heck of a play on second down.
translation.zh: 你完美地阻止了二档进攻

translation.en: You saved the game.
translation.zh: 你拯救了比赛

translation.en: Thanks, coach.
translation.zh: 谢谢 教练

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 太好了！加油 斯巴达人！

translation.en: Fantastic. Everyone looks great.
translation.zh: 太美妙了 人人都很开心

translation.en: Tonight, the feeling is electric.
translation.zh: 今晚的感觉棒极了

translation.en: The team's rolling up right now, it couldn't be more exciting.
translation.zh: 球队现在下车了还能有比这更激动的场面吗？

translation.en: This is what these people...
translation.zh: 支持者们已经…

translation.en: ...have been waiting for.
translation.zh: …等很久了

translation.en: Tayshon, come on.
translation.zh: 泰兴 来

translation.en: -Beaser, take that sign down. -Yes, sir.
translation.zh: -毕瑟尔 拿掉那个标语-是 教练

translation.en: Come on, buddy. Don't be shy, chat with us.
translation.zh: 来吧 伙计 别害羞 跟我们说几句

translation.en: Hey, man, take it down.
translation.zh: 嘿 伙计 放下来

translation.en: How does it feel to go from being the biggest loser to the biggest winner?
translation.zh: 从最大的输家变成最大的赢家这是种什么感觉？

translation.en: -It's great. -Great?
translation.zh: -感觉很棒-只是很棒而已？

translation.en: Dude, you are on your way to a new streak!
translation.zh: 伙计 你正在开启一个新的连胜纪录

translation.en: No, no.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Streak!
translation.zh: 连胜

translation.en: Our goal is to go out and give the perfect effort on every play.
translation.zh: 我们的目标就是上场然后每场比赛都拼尽全力

translation.en: Perfect effort? The secret?
translation.zh: 拼尽全力 这是成功的秘诀吗？

translation.en: But we a team, and Chris Ryan is like--
translation.zh: 我们是一支球队克里斯莱恩就像是…

translation.en: Is dope, no doubt, but, look, man, you are a star.
translation.zh: 听着 伙计 你才是明星

translation.en: You're the man who's gonna lead DLS to the next what?
translation.zh: 你要带领德拉萨尔取得下一轮什么？

translation.en: -The next what? -Streak!
translation.zh: -下一轮什么？-连胜

translation.en: Streak! Streak! Streak!
translation.zh: 连胜！

translation.en: Another streak, baby!
translation.zh: 下一轮连胜 宝贝！

translation.en: Yes! One hundred and fifty games!
translation.zh: 是啊 150场比赛

translation.en: -Streak! Streak! Streak! -Let's go.
translation.zh: -连胜！-我们走吧

translation.en: Streak! Streak! Streak!
translation.zh: 连胜！

translation.en: Streak! Streak! Streak!
translation.zh: 连胜！

translation.en: There he goes!
translation.zh: 他得分了

translation.en: Growing up is tough.
translation.zh: 成长是艰难的

translation.en: It's not easy.
translation.zh: 成长并不容易

translation.en: That's what our program's about.
translation.zh: 这是我们球队的内涵

translation.en: It ain't about the football.
translation.zh: 无关橄榄球

translation.en: It ain't about scoring the touchdowns.
translation.zh: 无关触地得分

translation.en: It's about moving you...
translation.zh: （德拉萨尔联赛保持不败） 重要的是确定好

translation.en: -...in a direction that can help you grow up. -And forgive us for our trespasses....
translation.zh: （德拉萨尔六连胜季后赛劲旅） -助你成长的方向-请原谅我们的冒犯

translation.en: So when you take your place out in the world...
translation.zh: （四分之一决赛德拉萨对匹兹堡） 当你找到了立足世界

translation.en: ...or out in our community, you can be depended on.
translation.zh: 或是立足社会的地方你就是可以信赖的

translation.en: You guys are rock stars!
translation.zh: 你们简直是摇滚明星

translation.en: Great game, Chris!
translation.zh: 比赛太棒了 克里斯！

translation.en: -Hey, streak 2.0! -It's a streak, man.
translation.zh: -嘿 连胜2.0-连胜了 伙计

translation.en: Faculty housing is also subsidized.
translation.zh: 教职员工买房也会有补助

translation.en: What's the offer?
translation.zh: 年薪多少？

translation.en: Three hundred fifty thousand. Three years. Firm.
translation.zh: 固定年薪35万 三年

translation.en: Performance bonus. Car.
translation.zh: 还有赢球奖金和配车

translation.en: Stanford sees you as a valuable investment.
translation.zh: 斯坦福相当重视你

translation.en: Hey, coach. Great game Friday. Three more touchdowns for the Beast.
translation.zh: 嘿 教练 周五的比赛很精彩野兽又多了三个达阵

translation.en: Yeah, he played well.
translation.zh: 是的 他表现很好

translation.en: -Whole team did. -Hey, Chris!
translation.zh: -整支队伍都很棒-嘿 克里斯

translation.en: Over here! Hi!
translation.zh: 这边 嗨

translation.en: What's up?
translation.zh: 你们好吗？

translation.en: Get ready to break that scoring record.
translation.zh: 准备好破掉那个得分纪录吧

translation.en: Got a place for the trophy all picked out.
translation.zh: 得为你获得的奖杯们腾地方

translation.en: -Hey, Mickey? -Yeah?
translation.zh: -嘿 米基？-嗯

translation.en: Did Chris show you the thesis he wrote for my class on Matthew 23:12?
translation.zh: 克里斯给你看过他写的论文吗？关于《马太福音》第23章第12节的

translation.en: Amazingly insightful for someone his age.
translation.zh: 以他的年龄而言 见解十分深刻

translation.en: Really terrific. You should read it.
translation.zh: 非常棒 你该读一读的

translation.en: Matthew 23:12? Seriously?
translation.zh: （加油 斯巴达人队！） 《马太福音》第23章第12节有没有搞错？

translation.en: What's he talking about?
translation.zh: 他在说什么？

translation.en: We're on our way to a championship, a state record.
translation.zh: 我们马上就是冠军了 还要破掉州纪录

translation.en: Those who exalt themselves will be humbled...
translation.zh: 凡自高的必降为卑

translation.en: ...those who humble themselves will be exalted.
translation.zh: 自卑的必升为高

translation.en: -Exalted? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -必升为高？-是的

translation.en: You get 37 touchdowns in the season, then you'll be exalted.
translation.zh: 你一个赛季完成37次达阵然后你就会被升高了

translation.en: Do you realize what winning this record is gonna mean for you? For your life?
translation.zh: 你还没有认清打破这项纪录对你和你的人生会有多重要吗？

translation.en: Do you have any idea how people are gonna look at you?
translation.zh: 你知道人们会怎样对你另眼相看吗？

translation.en: How they're gonna respect you?
translation.zh: 你知道他们会多尊重你吗？

translation.en: Breaking this record, you'll have something...
translation.zh: 打破纪录的话 你得到的东西

translation.en: ...that nobody can ever take from you. Nobody.
translation.zh: 没人能够抢走 没人

translation.en: That's why I push you so hard. It's not about me, it's about you.
translation.zh: 这也是我逼得这么紧的原因这不是我的事情 是你的

translation.en: You're a salesman, Dad.
translation.zh: 你是个推销员 爸爸

translation.en: I'm a what?
translation.zh: 我是个什么？

translation.en: You sell cars.
translation.zh: 你推销汽车

translation.en: Don't try and sell me.
translation.zh: 别试着推销我

translation.en: This is for you.
translation.zh: 这个纪录是你的

translation.en: I'm just another one of your trophies you keep in your case.
translation.zh: 我只是你保存在箱子里的一座奖杯罢了

translation.en: Like all the medals you've been collecting to show everybody when they walk in.
translation.zh: 就像那些你收集的金属奖牌一样只为了给每个进门的人炫耀

translation.en: I am sick of it.
translation.zh: 我受够了

translation.en: What are you trying to say? You don't want this record?
translation.zh: 你在说什么 克里斯？你不想破纪录？

translation.en: What do you care? It's always about what you want!
translation.zh: 你怎么会在意我想要什么？从头到尾都是你想要什么

translation.en: You little punk. Don't you ever talk to me like that!
translation.zh: 你这个小混蛋你居然敢跟我这么说话

translation.en: While you live in my house, you will do as I say...
translation.zh: 既然你住我的房子 吃我的饭就要听我的话

translation.en: ...and you will show me the respect I deserve! You understand me?
translation.zh: 还要给我应得的尊重 你明白吗？

translation.en: Now you tell me with that mouth of yours...
translation.zh: 你现在告诉我

translation.en: ...you promise me that you'll go out and get me that record.
translation.zh: 跟我保证 你会给我打破那个纪录

translation.en: Promise me, Chris.
translation.zh: 保证 克里斯

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: No, Chris. I wanna hear you say it. Say it!
translation.zh: 不 克里斯我要听你说出来 说！

translation.en: I promise I'll get you that record, Dad!
translation.zh: 我保证会打破那个纪录 爸

translation.en: Attaboy.
translation.zh: 这才是好孩子

translation.en: And in local sports, we toss it to Jim, who's standing by at De La Salle high.
translation.zh: 本地体育报道 我们转到吉姆那边他现在就在德拉萨尔高中

translation.en: De La Salle Spartans pulled off one of the greatest comebacks in sports.
translation.zh: 经历了一个毁灭性的开局德拉萨尔斯巴达人队上演了

translation.en: After a devastating opening...
translation.zh: 体育史上最精彩的王者归来的戏码

translation.en: ...they're poised to compete for their 13th championship.
translation.zh: 现在他们正向第13座冠军奖杯发起冲击

translation.en: Dad, look. It's about the championship game.
translation.zh: 爸爸 看 是冠军决赛的报道

translation.en: All around me and very excited are the new generation of Spartans.
translation.zh: 我身边这些兴奋的孩子们是新一代的斯巴达人

translation.en: -What grade are you guys in? -Sophomores, play on the JV.
translation.zh: -你们的成绩怎么样啊-我上二年级 在青年队打球

translation.en: You're riding a nine-game streak. What do you think about that?
translation.zh: 你们已经连赢了九场比赛有什么打算吗？

translation.en: If we go undefeated in our junior- and senior-year season...
translation.zh: 如果我们在三年级和四年级继续保持不败

translation.en: ...we're gonna push this streak to 33 games in a row.
translation.zh: 这个纪录就会是33场连胜

translation.en: Thirty-three, 33, 33!
Thirty-three games in a row.
translation.zh: 连胜33场

translation.en: -Thirty-three, 33, 33! -Back to you.
Thirty-three, 33, 33!
Bob?
translation.zh: 鲍伯？

translation.en: Hey, you.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Yeah, I couldn't sleep.
translation.zh: 我睡不着

translation.en: Are you seriously considering that?
translation.zh: 你真的在认真考虑这个吗？

translation.en: You know, when we started this 25 years ago...
translation.zh: 25年前我开始做这份工作的时候

translation.en: ...there was no Internet.
translation.zh: 那时还没有网络

translation.en: No high-school football on TV.
translation.zh: 电视上不会播高中橄榄球比赛

translation.en: Not every kid alive was a celebrity.
translation.zh: 打球的孩子们不会变成明星

translation.en: It's all changed now.
translation.zh: 现在一切都变了

translation.en: Maybe the kids have changed too.
translation.zh: 也许孩子们也变了

translation.en: All the things I've taught and believed in.
translation.zh: 我所信奉的 以及我教给他们的

translation.en: I don't know if I'm still doing much good here.
translation.zh: 我不知道在这里我是不是还有用武之地

translation.en: I better get some sleep.
translation.zh: 我还是去睡吧

translation.en: Is this mine?
translation.zh: 这是给我的吗？

translation.en: Who else's would it be? Of course it's yours.
translation.zh: 还能给谁？当然是给你的

translation.en: How do I look?
translation.zh: 好看吗？

translation.en: -Real cool, man. Real cool. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -非常酷 伙计 酷毙了-谢谢

translation.en: -Oh, my gosh. Okay, I'm dying, I'm dying. -Thank you again.
translation.zh: -天啊 我快被压死了-谢谢你

translation.en: Get dressed. Let's go to the game.
translation.zh: 穿衣服 我们去看比赛

translation.en: De La Salle staged a miraculous comeback...
translation.zh: 德拉萨尔上演了奇迹般的王者归来

translation.en: ...for an unprecedented 13th shot at the sectional championship.
translation.zh: 正向着连续第13座分区冠军奖杯发起冲击

translation.en: On the line for running back Chris Ryan is a personal quest...
translation.zh: 克里斯莱恩还有一项对个人荣誉的追求

translation.en: ...as he takes the field only three touchdowns away from breaking a record.
translation.zh: 他距离打破州得分纪录只差三个达阵

translation.en: Let us begin. Our father, who art in heaven...
translation.zh: 开始吧 我们在天上的父

translation.en: ...hallowed be thy name.
translation.zh: 愿你的名被尊为圣

translation.en: Thy kingdom come. Thy will be done on earth as it is in heaven.
translation.zh: 愿你的国降临愿你的旨意行在地上 如同行在天上

translation.en: Give us this day our daily bread and forgive us our trespasses...
translation.zh: 我们日用的饮食今日赐给我们 免我们的债

translation.en: ...as we forgive those who trespass against us.
translation.zh: 如同我们免了人的债

translation.en: Lead us not to temptation, but deliver us from evil. Amen.
translation.zh: 不叫我们遇见试探救我们脱离凶恶 阿门

translation.en: -One, two, three. -Spartans!
translation.zh: -一 二 三-斯巴达人

translation.en: This season is ending with De La Salle in a familiar place:
translation.zh: 在这个跌宕起伏的赛季末德拉萨尔来到了这个熟悉的位置

translation.en: Competing for their 13th North Coast section championship.
translation.zh: 为他们的第13座北分区冠军而奋斗

translation.en: Danny Ladouceur is slammed to the turf...
translation.zh: 丹尼拉杜尔斯被撞倒在草皮上

translation.en: ...but somehow holds on for a De La Salle first down.
translation.zh: 但他居然保住了德拉萨尔的首攻

translation.en: -Yeah, Danny boy! -Huddle up. Get it to Chris. Let's go.
translation.zh: -干得好 丹尼小子-加油传球给克里斯 快去吧

translation.en: De La Salle is a favorite to win this game.
translation.zh: 德拉萨尔队基本能够锁定这场比赛的胜利

translation.en: And most eyes are on Chris Ryan's quest for a touchdown scoring record.
translation.zh: 所以更多的注视投向了克里斯莱恩能否打破得分纪录

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 太棒了！

translation.en: Yeah, that's it! That's it! Way to go.
translation.zh: 太棒了 就是这样 继续

translation.en: One down, two to go for the record. Two more touchdowns for the record.
translation.zh: 完成一个 还剩两个破纪录还剩两个达阵就破纪录了

translation.en: Chris Ryan's historic run at the state touchdown record...
translation.zh: 克里斯莱恩离纪录越来越近他又完成一次达阵

translation.en: ...continues with another touchdown as De La Salle takes a 7-0 lead.
translation.zh: 帮助德拉萨尔七比零领先

translation.en: Pick him up!
translation.zh: 去争球

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Why didn't you tackle him?
translation.zh: 为什么没人去擒抱他？

translation.en: It is a contact sport.
translation.zh: 这项运动需要身体接触

translation.en: You can hit someone. It's encouraged even.
translation.zh: 你不但可以去撞 而且应该去撞

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 好球

translation.en: With just a little over five minutes left...
translation.zh: 这场激烈的冠军争夺战

translation.en: ...in the second quarter in this hard-fought championship, the score is tied, 7-7.
translation.zh: 第二节还剩五分钟比分为七比七平

translation.en: Beaser, you need to keep him contained!
translation.zh: 毕瑟尔 你要防住他

translation.en: Hut, blue one, hut!
translation.zh: 开球 蓝一 开球

translation.en: Reverse! Reverse!
translation.zh: 反向跑动

translation.en: -Contain the runner! -Contain the runner!
translation.zh: -抱住他-抱住他

translation.en: Amador Valley dips into its bag of tricks, but Joe Beaser isn't fooled.
translation.zh: 阿玛多谷队耍了个花样不过琼毕瑟尔并没有上当

translation.en: The senior defensive end played that perfectly.
translation.zh: 这位四年级防守端锋表现很出色

translation.en: De La Salle is up 14-7 here in the fourth quarter.
translation.zh: 德拉萨尔带着14比7的比分进入到第四节

translation.en: The Spartans have the ball on the Dons' 35-yard line.
translation.zh: 斯巴达人队带球推进到了35码线处

translation.en: Chris Ryan is one touchdown away from tying the state record.
translation.zh: 克里斯莱恩还有一个达阵就能平掉州纪录

translation.en: Danny.
translation.zh: 丹尼

translation.en: Coach.
translation.zh: 教练

translation.en: Watch the defensive back.
translation.zh: 看好防守队员

translation.en: He leans inside a lot. When he does, beat him to the corner.
translation.zh: 他经常游走到界内他一进来 就把他撞到角卫那里

translation.en: Give him a hard fake on your first move. Finish strong.
translation.zh: 然后用假动作骗过他完美结局

translation.en: Corner.
translation.zh: 角卫

translation.en: Thirty-four, 34. Give it to 34.
translation.zh: 34 把球传给34号

translation.en: Chris, Chris, Chris!
translation.zh: （克里斯莱恩 34号破纪录） 克里斯！

translation.en: Down. Set, hut!
translation.zh: 下蹲 开球

translation.en: -Yeah! -Chris Ryan won't be denied.
translation.zh: -太棒了！-可不要小看克里斯莱恩

translation.en: He scores again to give De La Salle a two-touchdown advantage.
translation.zh: 他又得分了德拉萨尔领先两个达阵分

translation.en: He is now just one touchdown away from breaking the state record.
translation.zh: 现在 他距离打破州得分纪录只剩一个达阵

translation.en: One more for the record.
translation.zh: 再来一个破纪录

translation.en: Set, hut!
translation.zh: 准备 开球

translation.en: Salinas.
translation.zh: 萨利纳斯

translation.en: This is your final drive as a Spartan.
translation.zh: 这是你身为斯巴达人的最后一场比赛

translation.en: Coach?
translation.zh: 教练？

translation.en: It's yours. You call the plays.
translation.zh: 这是你的比赛 你来指挥吧

translation.en: Chris, Chris, Chris!
translation.zh: 克里斯！

translation.en: Strong right, 16 midline on one. Ready?
translation.zh: 右路强攻 推进16码到中线准备好了吗？

translation.en: Chris, Chris, Chris!
translation.zh: 克里斯！

translation.en: Down. Set, hut!
translation.zh: 下蹲 开球

translation.en: Go, come on!
translation.zh: 加油啊

translation.en: Come on, block for him! Give him some help, will you?
translation.zh: 加油 挡住他帮帮他 好吗？

translation.en: Come on!
translation.zh: 加油！

translation.en: One more for the record. Give it to the Beast. Give it to Chris.
translation.zh: 还剩一个破纪录传球给野兽 传球给克里斯 快！

translation.en: Down.
translation.zh: 下蹲

translation.en: Set, hut!
translation.zh: 预备 开球

translation.en: Booyah, baby!
translation.zh: 不错嘛 宝贝

translation.en: Hey, good catch, dog.
translation.zh: 接得漂亮

translation.en: Come on, come on. There's still time. Still time. Let's get it to Chris.
translation.zh: 加油 还有时间呢把球给克里斯

translation.en: Chris, Chris, Chris!
translation.zh: 克里斯！

translation.en: Break that record, son. Let's go.
translation.zh: 儿子 破纪录啊 加油

translation.en: Here we go, baby, 41 blast into the record books.
translation.zh: 来 兄弟 跑卫强冲进史册

translation.en: Here we go.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: It's the last play of the game, dog. Make me proud.
translation.zh: 这是你的最后一场比赛让我们骄傲吧

translation.en: Time out.
translation.zh: 暂停

translation.en: -What are they doing? -I don't know. It's their drive.
translation.zh: -他们在做什么-我不知道 他们在指挥比赛

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Coach Lad's doing this for me.
translation.zh: -你要干嘛？-我的一切都是拉德教练赋予的

translation.en: -He won't say-- -Dude, what are you talking about?
translation.zh: -他什么都不会说 因为他知道…-伙计 你在说什么？

translation.en: I just-- I don't want my last play as a Spartan to be about me.
translation.zh: 我…我不希望身为斯巴达人的最后一场比赛是以我为中心

translation.en: Why not? You trained to get here, you deserve it.
translation.zh: 为什么不？这是你努力训练的成果是你应得的

translation.en: Look, it's an easy shot.
translation.zh: 听着 这是个再容易不过的选择

translation.en: He never took the easy shot.
translation.zh: 但他从来不选容易的选项

translation.en: Coming back to coach us, he could have died.
translation.zh: 回来给我们当教练他可能会死

translation.en: And what have we done for him?
translation.zh: 我们又为他做了什么呢？

translation.en: Won a few games? A championship?
translation.zh: 赢几场比赛 赢下冠军

translation.en: No, he's right.
translation.zh: 他是对的

translation.en: While we've been staring at the dirt, coach has been saying look up.
translation.zh: 我们在困境中苦苦挣扎的时候是教练让我们振作起来

translation.en: It's about time we did.
translation.zh: 现在轮到我们了

translation.en: It's time for us to stand tall. Victory formation.
translation.zh: 轮到我们站起来了胜利阵型

translation.en: No, no, no. You gotta do it.
translation.zh: 不 你来做

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Boys, no matter where we go or what we achieve...
translation.zh: 兄弟们 不管将来我们走到哪里 有怎样的成就

translation.en: ...nothing's gonna come close to what we have right here.
translation.zh: 我都不可能再拥有此时此刻我们拥有的一切

translation.en: You're all my brothers. Spartans for life.
translation.zh: 你们都是我的兄弟一生都是斯巴达人

translation.en: Spartans for life.
translation.zh: 一生都是斯巴达人

translation.en: Shotgun formation, direct snap, on me, on one. Ready?
translation.zh: 散弹枪阵型直接传给我 准备好了吗？

translation.en: De La Salle is lining up in shotgun formation...
translation.zh: 德拉萨尔队摆出了散弹枪阵型

translation.en: ...but Chris Ryan is quarterback instead of Salinas.
translation.zh: 但四分卫位置上的是克里斯莱恩而不是萨利纳斯

translation.en: This is a formation we haven't seen from De La Salle.
translation.zh: 这是德拉萨尔队以前没有用过的阵型

translation.en: Look for Ryan to run this in for his record-setting 89th career touchdown.
translation.zh: 让我们见证莱恩跑向他第89个破纪录的达阵吧

translation.en: Maybe this wasn't the best time to give Salinas free will.
translation.zh: 也许这个时候让萨利纳斯指挥比赛不是个好主意

translation.en: Down. Set, hut!
translation.zh: 下蹲 预备 开球

translation.en: -There's the snap, and Ryan... -What the hell was that?
translation.zh: -开球 然后莱恩…-搞什么鬼

translation.en: ...takes a knee.
translation.zh: 跪下了

translation.en: Wow, rather than running in for his 89th career touchdown...
translation.zh: 不可思议 克里斯莱恩选择跪下而没有去追求

translation.en: ...Chris Ryan instead opts to take a knee.
translation.zh: 他职业生涯的第89个达阵

translation.en: What are you doing, coach?
translation.zh: 教练 你在做什么？

translation.en: Let him run it. Forty-one blast, come on. There's still time. Run it! Run it!
translation.zh: 让他跑 跑卫强冲 快点还有时间呢 快跑

translation.en: -Mickey, Bob's not calling the plays. -You don't understand football.
translation.zh: -米基 鲍伯没在指挥比赛-你根本不懂橄榄球

translation.en: It's not about football.
translation.zh: 这与橄榄球无关

translation.en: Your husband is costing my son this record.
translation.zh: 你丈夫让我儿子赔上了纪录

translation.en: My husband's turning your son into a man.
translation.zh: 我丈夫让你儿子成为真正的男人

translation.en: -You're the only person who doesn't see. -Down, set, hut!
translation.zh: -而你是唯一看不到这一点的人-蹲下 准备 开球

translation.en: No, no, no. Come on.
translation.zh: 不 拜托

translation.en: -Ryan takes another knee. -Time out. Stop that clock, Ladouceur.
translation.zh: -莱恩又一次跪下了-暂停 拉杜尔斯 快暂停

translation.en: Stop that clock and run that play.
translation.zh: 快暂停 让他得分

translation.en: Run the play! Let him get the record! Come on!
translation.zh: 让他得分 让他破纪录 快点

translation.en: What could've been a record-shattering night has now turned into a tribute...
translation.zh: 原本可能会打破纪录的夜晚

translation.en: ...to the man who took them here, Coach Bob Ladouceur.
translation.zh: 成了孩子们献给带他们踏上这片赛场的鲍伯拉杜尔斯教练的礼物

translation.en: -Why didn't that boy get his record? -Because it's not about the record.
translation.zh: -他不去破纪录为什么？-因为纪录无关紧要

translation.en: -Nine, eight, seven, six... -It's about the team.
translation.zh: -九 八 七-球队才重要

translation.en: ...five, four...
translation.zh: 五 四

translation.en: ...three, two, one.
translation.zh: 三 二 一

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 好耶！

translation.en: For you.
translation.zh: 献给你

translation.en: Come here.
translation.zh: 过来

translation.en: DLS, DLS, DLS!
translation.zh: 德拉萨尔

translation.en: Remember one other thing:
translation.zh: 记住另一件事

translation.en: Nobody on this staff expects you to play perfect tonight.
translation.zh: 没人期待你们今晚能打一场完美的比赛

translation.en: That's impossible. But what we do expect...
translation.zh: 这是不可能的 但是我们希望

translation.en: ...and you should expect from yourself and each other...
translation.zh: 也是你们该要求自己和相互要求的

translation.en: ...is a perfect effort.
translation.zh: 要尽全力

translation.en: I'll say this about Bob Ladouceur...
translation.zh: 我这么评价鲍伯拉杜尔斯

translation.en: ...that he's a better coach than our big-time college coaches...
translation.zh: （约翰麦登前任奥克兰雷达队教练） 他比大学里的一流教练更加优秀

translation.en: ...and he's a better coach than our big-time pro coaches.
translation.zh: 比一流的职业教练更加优秀

translation.en: Everybody stands up as an individual and says, "My name is DJ Williams.
translation.zh: 每个人都要单独站起来说“我叫DJ威廉姆斯

translation.en: I commit to 20 carries, 150 yards, seven tackles and no dropped passes."
translation.zh: （为迈阿密大学与丹佛野马队效力） 我贡献了20次持球 推进150码七次擒抱 每次传球都接住了”

translation.en: Once you say that, you hand the card to somebody, and you shake hands...
translation.zh: 说完后 你把卡片递给其他人你们握手

translation.en: ...and they say, "I hold you to that commitment."
translation.zh: 然后他们说：“你要信守承诺”

translation.en: To the Kelly family, Landrin and Bevelyn.
translation.zh: （卡姆科尔文与特伦斯“TK”凯利） 致凯利的家人兰德林和毕芙琳

translation.en: My heart breaks for your loss, and I pray for your recovery.
translation.zh: 我为你们痛失家人而心碎祈祷你们早日走出阴影

translation.en: God bless you both...
translation.zh: 上帝保佑你们俩

translation.en: ...and please, take some solace in the fact...
translation.zh: 以下这点或许能给你们带来一丝慰藉

translation.en: ...that you did a fantastic job.
translation.zh: 你们培养出了一位优秀的孩子

translation.en: I told you before, this is the last thing I'm gonna say.
translation.zh: 一张纪念TK的条幅神秘地出现在广告牌上） 这是我要说的最后几句话

translation.en: Growing up is painful.
translation.zh: 成长是痛苦的

translation.en: It's not easy.
translation.zh: 并不容易

translation.en: But that's what our program is about, in case you haven't figured it out.
translation.zh: 提醒一下还没弄明白的人这是我们球队的内涵

translation.en: It ain't about the football.
translation.zh: 这无关橄榄球

translation.en: It ain't about scoring touchdowns.
translation.zh: 无关达阵得分

translation.en: It ain't about the win streak.
translation.zh: 也无关取得连胜

translation.en: It's about moving you in a direction...
translation.zh: 重点是确定好

translation.en: ...that will assist you and help you grow up.
translation.zh: 助你成长的方向

translation.en: So when you can take your place...
translation.zh: 所以 当你找到

translation.en: ...out in the world, and out in society, and out in our community...
translation.zh: 立足世界或是立足社会的地方

translation.en: ...you can be depended on.
translation.zh: 你就值得信赖

translation.en: Lad said it. He goes:
translation.zh: 拉德说

translation.en: "You know, if, you know, Terry wasn't on my staff...
translation.zh: （帕特海耶斯 助理教练1983年-1993年） “如果特里不一起来

translation.en: ...I wouldn't be doing this right now."
translation.zh: 我现在不可能还干这个”

translation.en: There's a tremendous bond of trust and friendship that's there.
translation.zh: 他们之间信任和友谊的纽带非常美妙

translation.en: They share a commitment to their players.
translation.zh: 他们一起对队员们倾注心血

translation.en: No matter what's going on, the players come first...
translation.zh: 无论如何 队员都排在第一位

translation.en: ...and that means the team.
translation.zh: 这意味着 队伍永远排在第一位

translation.en: They will never sacrifice the team for the individual.
translation.zh: 他们永远不会因为个人利益而牺牲球队利益

translation.en: And all they wanna do is create a community...
translation.zh: 他们想共同创建一支球队

translation.en: ...have a common goal, and play the game.
translation.zh: 有着共同的目标 一起打比赛

translation.en: We're De La Salle. Some guys wanna call it a curse...
translation.zh: 我们是德拉萨尔 有些人称之为诅咒

translation.en: ...I say that's the blessing of De La Salle.
translation.zh: 我说这是对德拉萨尔的祝福

translation.en: You gotta go out every week and prove it.
translation.zh: 以后的每一周你都能证明这一点

translation.en: So when you show up tomorrow, whatever it is that excites you...
translation.zh: 明天你们出场时不管是什么让你兴奋起来

translation.en: ...whatever it is that's gonna get you to bring your A-game and your A-heart...
translation.zh: 什么抓住了你的心让你尽可能打出最棒的比赛

translation.en: ...you bring it and you do it.
translation.zh: 你都要抓住好好利用

translation.en: I don't know what that is for you. What is it that gets your heart swollen.
translation.zh: 我不知道对你而言究竟是什么什么能让你热血沸腾

translation.en: Hopefully, it's gonna be that last chapter in the book...
translation.zh: 希望是这本书的最后一节

translation.en: ...that you've written for yourself this year.
translation.zh: 你们今年自己写的这本书

translation.en: And I'd like to say, I'd like to just call that last chapter just what--
translation.zh: 我想说我们就把最后一节命名为…

translation.en: Just what Coach Eidson called it.
translation.zh: 爱迪生教练起的名字

translation.en: Last chapter of the book isn't the NCS 3A title or San Leandro.
translation.zh: 书的最后一节不是北岸区3A级别冠军奖杯或圣利安卓

translation.en: It's "Brotherhood."
translation.zh: 而是《兄弟情》

translation.en: That's what it should be titled.
translation.zh: 这个标题才名副其实
